Description:
Buy Nose Strip Online in Bangladesh from Arogga Limited

 

The Beauty Glazed Nose Strip Blackheads Remover is your go-to solution for quick and effective blackhead removal. Designed to unclog pores and provide the deepest clean, these strips leave your skin feeling fresh and revitalized in just 10 minutes.

 

Beauty Glazed is committed to providing high-quality skincare solutions to meet your needs. These nose strips are formulated to deliver effective results quickly and conveniently, ensuring your skin stays clear and healthy.

 

For a quick, easy, and effective solution to blackhead removal, choose Beauty Glazed Nose Strip Blackheads Remover. Achieve a deep clean and refreshed skin in just 10 minutes with these easy-to-use strips, available at Arogga.

Attribute Details
Brand/Manufacturer Name Beauty Glazed
Item Form Strips
Features Fast blackhead removal, unclogs pores, deep cleans
Count 6 strips per pack

Used for Blackhead removal, pore cleansing
Precautions Avoid contact with eyes, not suitable for use around eyes

 

Details of Beauty Glazed Nose Strip Blackheads Remover

  • Fast Blackhead Removal: Removes blackheads in just 10 minutes.
  • Unclogs Pores & Achieves the Deepest Clean: Cleans up dirt and oil from your pores, leaving your skin feeling fresh and clean.
  • Clean up dirt and oil from your pores, leaving your skin feeling fresh and clean

 

Product Highlights

  • Quick Blackhead Removal: Removes blackheads in just 10 minutes.
  • Deep Pore Cleansing: Unclogs pores for the deepest clean.
  • Easy Application: Simple steps for hassle-free use.
  • Skin Refreshing: Removing dirt and oil leaves skin feeling fresh and clean.

 

How to Use

 

These easy-to-use strips will help extract built-up dirt and oil from your pores that can cause blackheads, leaving your skin feeling fresh and clean.

 

Step 1: Clean the face thoroughly with water to ensure that the skin does not have any cosmetics or other skincare.

Step 2: Wet the nose area thoroughly with clean, warm water. Please note that if the skin is dry, the adhesive strip will not stick.

Step 3: Open the sachet with dry hands, and then peel it off the liner.

Step 4: Place the strip on the nose with the light side down, taking care to smooth out bubbles or creases.

Step 5: Let the strip dry naturally for about 10 to 15 minutes, and then carefully start peeling the strip from the ends to the middle. If the strip is secured too tightly or is difficult to remove, thoroughly wet the area until the strip is easy to remove.

Step 6: When the strip is completely dry, you can peel it off. Precautions: For nose only. Not suitable for use around the eyes. If the strips do come into contact with eyes, rinse immediately with clean, warm water.

 

Safety Guide

  • For external use only.
  • Avoid contact with eyes; if contact occurs, rinse immediately with clean, warm water.
  • Not suitable for use around the eyes.
  • Discontinue use if irritation occurs.

 

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) about Nose Pore Strips

 

Q1: What are the benefits of using nose pore strips and how do they work?

 

A: Nose pore strips help in effectively removing blackheads and impurities from the pores, providing a deep clean and leaving the skin feeling fresh and smooth. These strips work by adhering to the impurities within the pores and pulling them out when the strip is peeled off.

 

Q2: How do charcoal strips differ from regular nose strips, and what are their advantages?

 

A: Charcoal strips are designed to absorb excess oil and impurities from the skin. The activated charcoal enhances its ability to draw out blackheads and provide a deep clean, making it ideal for oily skin. They help control oiliness, minimize clogged pores, and leave the skin with a matte complexion.

 

Q3: Can nose strips be used as part of a regular skincare routine, and how often should they be used?

 

A: Yes, incorporating nose strips into your skincare routine can help maintain clear pores and prevent the buildup of dirt and oil. However, it is important to use them as directed, typically once or twice a week, to avoid overuse and potential skin irritation.

 

Q4: What is the proper way to use nose cleaning strips, and what precautions should be taken?

 

A: To use a nose strip, first clean and wet your nose thoroughly. Apply the strip with the adhesive side down, smooth out any bubbles, let it dry for the recommended time, and then peel it off starting from the edges. Precautions include avoiding use on broken or irritated skin and keeping the strips away from the eyes. If irritation occurs, discontinue use and consult a dermatologist.

 

Q5: What are the benefits of using deep cleansing strips and how do they compare to other types of nose strips?

 

A: Deep cleansing strips penetrate deeper into the pores to remove stubborn blackheads, dirt, and oil. They provide a more thorough clean compared to regular nose strips. Additionally, they are formulated to adhere strongly to impurities, ensuring a more effective removal of embedded blackheads.

 

Q6: How do pore refining strips and acne treatment strips benefit the skin, and can they be used together?

 

A: Pore refining strips help minimize the appearance of pores by removing impurities and tightening the skin, leading to a smoother texture. Acne treatment strips remove blackheads and help reduce acne by unclogging pores and controlling excess oil. These strips can be used together as part of a comprehensive skincare regimen, but it’s important to follow product instructions to avoid overuse and potential irritation.

Q7: What should be done if a nose pore strip causes irritation, and how can long-term clear skin be achieved using these strips?

 

A: If a nose pore strip causes irritation, discontinue use immediately and rinse the affected area with clean, warm water. If irritation persists, consult a dermatologist. For long-term clear skin, follow a regular pore strip regimen as part of your skincare routine, ensuring to use the strips correctly and not overusing them. Regular use helps prevent the buildup of dirt and oil in the pores, maintaining a clear and healthy complexion.

Description:
Tretin 0.025% Cream Uses, Benefits, Price

Tretinoin 0.025% topical cream is a powerful medication designed to treat acne, significantly reducing the number and severity of pimples while promoting rapid healing of those that do appear. As a member of the retinoid class of medications, Tretinoin works by influencing the growth of skin cells, making it a reliable solution for acne sufferers.

 

Retino-A (Tretinoin) is applied topically to the face. Patients should ask their doctor if they are unsure of the proper application procedure. You must ensure that your hands, as well as the area of skin requiring treatment are clean before you apply the cream. Use a gentle cleanser to wash your face, and gently dry it. Your doctor may tell you to apply it once per day, just before you go to bed. In some cases, 8 to 12 weeks of applying this cream may be required in order for the full benefits to be noticed. Acne may appear to worsen at the start of treatment, however, with continued treatment it should improve. Keep using the cream as directed by your doctor.

 

Tretinoin 0.025% Cream is a form of vitamin A. It is used for the treatment of acne, a common skin condition that occurs when the pores of your skin become clogged causing blackheads, whiteheads, or pimples. It also reduces the wrinkles on your face. It works by reducing oil production in the skin and replenishing acne-prone skin.

 

Tretinoin 0.025% Cream rarely shows side effects. However, in some cases, it may cause peeling of the skin, burning sensation, irritation, itching, or redness at the site of application. Consult your doctor if any of these side effects do not resolve with time or worsen.

 

Tretinoin 0.025% Cream should be used as prescribed by your doctor. Clean and dry the acne-prone skin area and apply a thin layer of this medicine. Wash your hands before and after applying this medicine. Use this medicine at night for better results. Avoid contact with your eyes, nose, mouth, or broken skin. Rinse thoroughly with water in case of accidental contact.

 

Country of origin India

 

Arogga offers Retino-A (Tretinoin) 0.025% Cream, a topical treatment for acne and visible signs of aging. This effective formula is a form of vitamin A that tackles acne at its source and promotes a smoother, younger-looking complexion.

 

BENEFITS OF TRETIN CREAM

 

In Treatment of Acne

Tretin 0.025% Cream is a form of vitamin A. It helps treat acne by clearing skin pores and preventing spots or pimples from appearing. It usually takes several weeks to have a noticeable effect so keep using it even if it appears not to be working. Sometimes acne may get worse before it gets better, however, with proper use, your skin will get clearer. The earlier you start using it, the less likely you are to get scars. This medicine will help improve your mood and uplift your confidence as your skin becomes acne-free. It should not be used if you have eczema or sunburned skin.
 

SIDE EFFECTS OF TRETIN CREAM

Most side effects do not require any medical attention and disappear as your body adjusts to the medicine. Consult your doctor if they persist or if you’re worried about them

 

Common side effects of Tretin

  • Erythema (skin redness)
  • Skin irritation
  • Dry skin
  • Dry lips
  • Pale red skin
  • Increased sensitivity to light
  •  

How to Use Tretinoin 0.025% Topical Cream

 

Preparation and Application Instructions

 

  • Read the Patient Information Leaflet: Before starting this medication and each time you get a refill, thoroughly read the Patient Information Leaflet provided by your pharmacist. This leaflet contains essential information on how to use Tretinoin correctly and safely.
  • Consult Healthcare Professionals: If you have any questions or concerns, consult your doctor or pharmacist to ensure you understand how to use this medication effectively.

 

Step-by-Step Application Process

 

  1. Wash Your Hands: Begin by washing your hands thoroughly to remove any dirt or bacteria.
  2. Cleanse the Affected Area: Gently clean the affected skin with a mild or soapless cleanser, then pat it dry with a soft towel. Avoid using harsh soaps or exfoliants as they can irritate the skin.
  3. Apply the Medication: Use your fingertips to apply a small amount of the cream (approximately the size of a pea) in a thin layer as directed by your doctor. Typically, Tretinoin is applied once daily at bedtime. For liquid formulations, a gauze pad or cotton swab can be used to apply the medication.
  4. Wait Before Application: For some preparations, it’s recommended to wait 20 to 30 minutes after cleansing your face before applying the medication. This ensures your skin is completely dry, reducing the risk of irritation.
  5. Avoid Sensitive Areas: Do not apply Tretinoin to the inner lip area, inside the nose or mouth, or on skin that is cut, scraped, sunburned, or affected by eczema.

 

Precautions

 

  • Eye Contact: Avoid getting the medication in your eyes. If accidental contact occurs, flush your eyes with large amounts of water. Contact your doctor if eye irritation develops.
  • Post-Application Handwashing: Wash your hands after applying the medication to prevent accidentally transferring it to your eyes or other sensitive areas.

 

Understanding Tretinoin’s Effects

 

Initial Reactions: During the first few weeks of using Tretinoin, your acne might initially appear worse. This reaction is normal as the medication works on pimples forming beneath the skin’s surface. Patience is key, as it may take 8 to 12 weeks to see noticeable improvements.

 

Consistency is Crucial

 

  • Regular Use: For optimal results, use Tretinoin consistently. Applying it at the same time each day can help you remember.
  • Dosage: Do not use a larger amount or apply it more frequently than prescribed. Overuse will not accelerate improvement and may increase the risk of redness, peeling, and discomfort.

 

Choosing the Right Form and Strength

 

Different Forms Available: Tretinoin is available in various forms and strengths, including gels, creams, and solutions. Your doctor will recommend the best type based on your skin condition and response to treatment.

 

Monitoring Progress:

  • Report to Your Doctor: Keep your doctor informed about your progress. If your condition persists or worsens, additional consultation may be necessary to adjust your treatment plan.

 

Maximizing the Benefits of Tretinoin

 

Skin Care Routine: Incorporate Tretinoin into a broader skincare routine for the best results. Use gentle, non-comedogenic products to avoid irritating your skin further. Moisturizers can help manage dryness and peeling that may occur with Tretinoin use.

 

Sun Protection

 

  • Sunscreen Use: Tretinoin can make your skin more sensitive to sunlight. Apply a broad-spectrum sunscreen with an SPF of at least 30 daily, even on cloudy days.
  • Protective Clothing: Wearing hats and protective clothing can further shield your skin from harmful UV rays.

 

Lifestyle Factors

 

  • Healthy Diet: A balanced diet rich in vitamins and minerals supports overall skin health. Foods high in antioxidants can help reduce inflammation and promote healing.
  • Hydration: Drinking plenty of water keeps your skin hydrated and helps flush out toxins.
  • Avoid Touching Your Face: Minimize touching your face to prevent transferring oils and bacteria that can exacerbate acne.

 

Common Questions About Tretinoin

 

How long does it take to see results with Tretinoin?

Results can vary, but it typically takes 8 to 12 weeks of consistent use to notice significant improvements in your skin.

 

Can I use Tretinoin with other acne treatments?

Consult your doctor before combining Tretinoin with other acne treatments. Some combinations may cause increased irritation or reduce effectiveness.

 

What should I do if I experience severe irritation?

If you experience severe irritation, redness, or peeling, contact your doctor. They may adjust your dosage or recommend a different treatment approach.

 

Is it safe to use Tretinoin during pregnancy?

Tretinoin is generally not recommended during pregnancy. Discuss alternative acne treatments with your doctor if you are pregnant or planning to become pregnant.

 

Can I wear makeup while using Tretinoin?

Yes, you can wear makeup, but choose non-comedogenic products that won’t clog your pores. Ensure your skin is clean before applying Tretinoin at bedtime.

 

How should I store Tretinoin?

 

Store Tretinoin at room temperature, away from light and moisture. Keep it out of reach of children and pets.

 

Tretinoin 0.025% topical cream is a proven and effective treatment for acne, offering significant benefits in reducing and healing pimples. By following the proper application instructions and maintaining a consistent skincare routine, you can achieve clearer, healthier skin. Always consult your healthcare provider with any concerns or questions to ensure the best results from your treatment.

Benefits of Using Salicylic Acid Daily Gentle Cleanser by COSRX

 

Cleanse Your Way to Clearer Skin

 

Unveil a fresh, clean, and clear complexion with COSRX Salicylic Acid Daily Gentle Cleanser. This powerful yet gentle formula is designed to cleanse deeply, fight acne, and maintain your skin’s natural balance. Perfect for everyday use, it targets breakouts, unclogs pores, and leaves your skin feeling refreshed and revitalized.

 

Proven Acne Treatment

 

With the power of salicylic acid, this cleanser is highly effective in treating and preventing acne. Regular use results in visibly clearer skin.

 

Gentle and Non-Drying

Why it's special?

BHA cleanser eradicates difficult-to-remove dead skin cells and skin trouble. Korean K Beauty pure soft gentle basic daily facial face cleanser cosmetic.

 

How to Use

  1. Wet your face with lukewarm water.
  2. Squeeze a small amount of cleanser into your hands and lather.
  3. Gently massage the lather onto your face in circular motions, avoiding the eye area.
  4. Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.
  5. Pat your face dry with a clean towel.
  6. Use twice daily, in the morning and at night, for optimal results.

 

Safety Guide

  • Suitable for oily and acne-prone skin types.
  • Avoid the eye area, and if contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.

 

 

Made in Korea

 

Frequently Asked Questions 

Q: Can I use CosRx Salicylic Acid Daily Gentle Cleanser every day?

A: Yes! The CosRx Salicylic Acid Cleanser is safe for daily use, especially if you have acne-prone skin. Consistent use helps keep your pores clean and prevents future breakouts.

 

Q: Is CosRx Salicylic Acid a gentle cleanser for oily skin?

A:  Absolutely. The CosRx Salicylic Acid Daily Gentle Cleanser is ideal for acne-prone and oily skin. Its non-drying formula helps fight acne and blemishes by gently removing dirt, bacteria, and excess sebum.

 

Q: When should I stop using the salicylic acid cleanser?

A:  If you experience severe skin irritation or peeling, stop using the product and consult a doctor. Mild irritation is normal, but severe reactions require medical advice.

 

Q: Is CosRx Salicylic Acid Cleanser effective for blackheads?

A:  Yes. The combination of salicylic acid and tea tree oil in the cleanser helps to combat blemishes, remove excess oil, and exfoliate dead skin cells, blackheads, and whiteheads.

 

Q: Should I use salicylic acid face wash in the morning or at night?

A: Using the salicylic acid wash at night is generally recommended, especially after an oil or balm to remove makeup or sunscreen. If your skin feels oily in the morning, you can use a mild cleanser.

 

Q: Can I leave the salicylic acid cleanser on overnight?

A:  No. Salicylic acid cleansers should not be left on overnight. They are designed to be rinsed off after application to avoid over-exfoliation and irritation. If you need a leave-on treatment, use a product specifically designed for that purpose and consult a skincare expert.

Q: Is this product suitable for sensitive skin?

A: Yes, it is formulated to be gentle enough for sensitive skin, but it’s always a good idea to do a patch test before full use.

Q: How often should I use this cleanser?

A: For best results, use it twice daily, in the morning and at night.

Q: Can this cleanser be used on all skin types?

A: Yes, it is suitable for all skin types, especially beneficial for oily and acne-prone skin.

Description:
Nisha Table By Hamdard Laboratories (WAQF) BD

Saffron + Sand Lizard + Nutmeg fruit


Nishat Table is an herbal supplement meticulously crafted to enhance sexual health and vitality. Combining the potent properties of Saffron, Nutmeg, Sand Lizard, Mace, and Elephant Creeper, this formulation aims to support libido, combat sexual debility, and promote overall youthful vigor.

 

  • Enhances Libido: Contains Saffron, Nutmeg, and other herbs known to boost sexual desire.
  • Combats Sexual Debility: Effective for loss of libido and premature ejaculation.
  • Supports Vitality: Helps maintain youthful vigor and reduces fatigue.
  • Therapeutic Class
  • Herbal and Nutraceuticals
  • Pharmacology

 

Each tablet contains

 

  • Saffron (Crocus sativus): 06.67 mg
  • Sand Lizard (Lacerta agilis): 66.67 mg
  • Nutmeg(Myristica fragrans) fruit: 33.33 mg
  • Mace(Myristica fragrans) arillus: 66.67 mg
  • Elephant Creeper (Argyreia speciosa): 33.33 mg

 

Indications

 

Nishat Silver is indicated in

  • Sexual debility
  • Loss of libido
  • Premature ejaculation
  • Fatigue

 

This is a unique preparation of Saffron (Crocus sativus), Nutmeg (Myristica fragrans), and other natural ingredients. It is a tonic to increase libido, helps retentive power, and maintains youthful vigour & vitality. It is effective in sexual debility, premature ejaculation, and fatigue.

 

Contraindications

 

It is contraindicated for children.

 

Precautions & Warnings

 

  • Keep out of reach of the children.
  • Always seek medical advice before taking any Nishat tablet, especially if you are on other medications or have underlying health conditions.
  • Nishat tablets can have side effects, including drowsiness, headache, nausea, and dry mouth. Monitor for these and consult a doctor if they occur.

 

Storage Conditions

 

Store at acool and dry place to protect from light.

 

How to Use

 

Take Nishat Tablet as directed by a healthcare professional. Typically, it is recommended to take the tablet with water.

Description:
K-Y Jelly Lubricant

This KY- Jelly (‡¶ï‡ßá ‡¶ì‡¶Ø‡¶º‡¶æ‡¶á ‡¶ú‡ßá‡¶≤) is indicated to enhance the comfort and ease of intimate activity for men and women, with or without latex condoms. K-Y Jelly is a water-based personal lubricant commonly used to reduce vaginal dryness and enhance comfort during sexual intercourse or masturbation. It is also utilized in medical settings for procedures requiring lubrication, such as prostate and gynecological examinations.¬†

This personal lubricant can be safely applied directly to a genital body orifice or a latex condom. The product can be used inside condoms to facilitate application or outside for lubrication during intercourses.
¬†

Buy KY Jelly (Lubricant, Safe) at Best Price in Bangladesh

This is a non-sticky, non-staining, non-greasy, and is compatible with latest Condoms. It is a water-soluble personal lubricant that provides comfort, helping both partners to enjoy comfortable sex on an ongoing basis. This lubricant formula is non-greasy and easily removed by rinsing, making it easy and convenient to use. Intended for penile, vaginal and/or anal application for intimate sexual activity and to supplement the body's natural lubrication. Apply desired amount to your intimate areas. Reapply as needed. Snap cap closed after use.
¬†

Dosage & Administration

Use KY Jelly exactly as directed on the label or as prescribed by your doctor. Simply apply the desired amount of lubricant to your intimate areas and reapply as needed for continued comfort. Please note, KY Jelly is not intended for pediatric use. It is advisable to wash the area where K-Y Jelly was applied after use to prevent potential skin irritation or infections. Use mild soap and water to cleanse the area thoroughly.¬†
¬†

Interaction

Drug interaction-related data not found. If any abnormality consult with the doctor.

Contraindications

This Jelly is contraindicated in persons with a known hypersensitivity to any of the components of the formulation.

Side Effects

No common side effects have been reported with this preparation. Few allergic reactions (rash; hives; itching; difficulty breathing; tightness in the chest; swelling of the mouth, face, lips, or tongue); new or worsening skin irritation may occur.

Pregnancy & Lactation

It may feel strange to have sex as the baby grows within, but so long as you're having a normal, healthy pregnancy, intercourse is generally considered safe but be sure to consult with doctor if you have any questions about safety. Avoid use if pregnant unless prescribed by physician. No known risk found during the lactation period.

Precautions & Warnings

Discontinue if irritation or discomfort occurs. Do not eat and keep the gel away from nose, eye and open wounds.¬†

This Jelly is not a contraceptive and does not contain a spermicide. Keep out of reach of children and away from eyes and ears. Do not use if quality seal on the opening of the tube or bottle is broken or missing. Avoid use if pregnant or breast feeding unless prescribed by your doctor. Glycerol-based lubrication gel may slow sperm down, so if you're trying to have a baby, talk to your doctor before use.

Therapeutic Class

Miscellaneous topical agents

Storage Conditions

Store at room temperature below 30¬∞C. Do not freeze.
¬†

Packaging

 

  • Each blister of Femicon contains 21 hormone tablets and 7 iron supplements.
  • Each pack of Femicon contains a blister with an insert (instruction sheet).

 

Type

 

  • A low-dose combined oral contraceptive pill (COC).

 

Benefits

 

  • Effectively prevents pregnancy when taken as directed.
  • Regulates menstrual cycles, reducing the risk of irregular or heavy bleeding.
  • Helps alleviate menstrual cramps and pain.
  • May improve acne and reduce the risk of certain ovarian and endometrial cancers.

 

Dosage and Administration

 

  • Take one hormone tablet daily for 21 consecutive days, starting on the first day of your period.
  • After completing the 21 hormone tablets, take one iron supplement daily for the next 7 days.
  • Repeat the cycle as directed by your healthcare provider.

 

Precautions and Warnings

 

  • Femicon is not suitable for everyone. Consult your healthcare provider before use to assess your risks and benefits.
  • Femicon may interact with certain medications, including antibiotics, antifungals, and anticonvulsants. Inform your healthcare provider about all medications you are taking.
  • Femicon may not be suitable for women with certain medical conditions, such as blood clots, liver disease, or uncontrolled high blood pressure.

Description:
Indications

Biotin is indicated in-

  • Hair loss
  • Weak, brittle, splitting or soft nails
  • Eczema & dermatitis.

Pharmacology

Biotin is an essential vitamin that is also known as vitamin H. It is involved in vital physiological function like fatty acid synthesis, amino acid catabolism and gluconeogenesis. It acts as a cofactor in the enzymatic carboxylation of pyruvate and acetyl-CoA. Biotin influences the growth and differentiation of epidermal cells and is therefore important for the formation and renewal of the skin, hair and nails. It functions as a coenzyme for mitochondrial carboxylases in hair roots and improves the keratin structure. Biotin deficiency may result in hair loss and a variety of systemic symptoms such as dermatitis, and aciduria. Biotin is one of the most prescribed nutritional supplements for any kind of hair loss.

Dosage & Administration

Biotin dose varies depending on disease condition and age group.

¬†

In adults: Generally 1-3 tablets per day or as advised by the physician.

¬†

In children: biotin deficiency affects between 1 week and 2 years of age and usually exhibits seizures, hypotonia, developmental delay, ataxia, hyperventilation, and coma. In this case, 5-10 tablets daily, crushed and mixed with water or any kind of fruit juice or as advised by the physician.

¬†

Recommended dietary allowance:

¬†

Infants-

  • 0-6 months: 5 mcg/day
  • 7-12 months: 6 mcg/day

Children-

  • 1-3 years: 8 mcg/day
  • 4-8 years: 12 mcg/day

Males and females-

  • 9-13 years: 20 mcg/day
  • 14-18 years: 25 mcg/day
  • ‚â•19 years: 30 mcg/day

Pregnancy: 30 mcg/day

¬†

Lactation: 35 mcg/day

* ‡¶ö‡¶ø‡¶ï‡¶ø‡ßé‡¶∏‡¶ï‡ßá‡¶∞ ‡¶™‡¶∞‡¶æ‡¶Æ‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶∂ ‡¶Æ‡ßã‡¶§‡¶æ‡¶¨‡ßá‡¶ï ‡¶î‡¶∑‡¶ß ‡¶∏‡ßá‡¶¨‡¶® ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡ßÅ‡¶®'

Interaction

There are indications that anticonvulsant drugs lower the plasma level of biotin. Antibiotic use may decrease the biotin contribution to the body made by the microflora of the large intestine. Excessive consumption of raw egg whites interferes with biotin absorption.

Contraindications

Contraindicated in patients with known hypersensitivity to any of the ingredients.

Side Effects

Well tolerated in the recommended dose. No biotin toxicity has been reported in individuals supplemented with as much as 200 mg orally or 20mg intravenously per day.

Pregnancy & Lactation

Sufficient clinical data is not available to use in pregnant women and lactating mother.

Therapeutic Class

Herbal and Nutraceuticals

Storage Conditions

Store in a cool and dry place, away from light and moisture. Keep out of reach of children.

English Description 


Peniton strengthens the tissue, stimulates the nerves and muscles, and increases blood flow to the male organ, giving it stiffness and a full erection. It also makes the male organ more pliable.



Composition

 
Each 5 ml contains-
  • Madar (Calotropis gigantea): 0.20 mg
  • Mace (Myristica fragrans) arillus: 0.23 mg
  • Nutmeg (Myristica fragrans) nut: 0.23 mg
  • Clove (Eugenia caryophyllus): 0.23 mg
  • Pellitory (Anacyclus pyrethrum) root: 0.23 mg
  • Safron (Crocus sativus): 0.07 mg
  • Castoreum: 0.07 mg
 

Indications

 
This is indicated in-
  • Sluggishness
  • Feebleness
  • Curvature
  • Shortness
  • Obliquity of male organ.

 

Therapeutic Class

 
Herbal and Nutraceuticals
 
 

Pharmacology

 
This is highly effective in sluggishness, feebleness, curvature, shortness, and obliquity of male organs. Excessive indulgence in sexual acts or other causes nerve, blood vessels and tissue to lose their elasticity and blood cannot store long time in the blood vessels which reduces the erecting time and makes the male organ weak. This preparation strengthens the tissue, and stimulates the nerves and muscles as well as the flow of blood in the male organ, thus providing it stiffness and full erection. It also increases the elasticity of the male organ.
 

Contraindications

 
There is no known contraindication.
 
 

Precautions & Warnings

 

 
Sexual copulation is strictly prohibited during use. Discontinue if there are any side effects and apply coconut oil on affected portion. Keep out of reach of the children.
 
 

Storage Conditions

 

 
Store at cool and dry place, protect from light.
Meta Description: Peniton Ointment is quite efficient in treating male organ sluggishness, feebleness, curvature, shortness, and obliquity. Nerves, blood vessels, and tissue lose supplenes

The  SmartCure Digital Thermometer is designed to provide accurate and easy-to-read temperature measurements. With its waterproof design, it can be easily rinsed with water after each use and disinfected with alcohol, ensuring hygiene and safety. The thermometer features a beep alert that signals the end of the measurement, eliminating the guesswork typically associated with traditional mercury thermometers.

 

Product Highlight

 

  • Swift, Precise Readings - Obtain accurate temperature readings orally or under the arm in under 2 minutes. Digital thermometers offer superior precision compared to analog versions.
  • Automated Features - The adult thermometer beeps once when activated and four times when reading is complete. It automatically shuts off after a few minutes to save battery life.
  • Clear Display - View results in Celsius on a user-friendly display. Switch between the two modes by long-pressing the power button for 2 seconds.
  • For All Ages - The standard-tip digital oral thermometer is easy to use and clean. Flexible-tip thermometers are available for kids, conforming to the skin for enhanced comfort.

Benefits:

  • Beep Alert: Audible alert at the end of the measurement for convenience.
  • High Precision: Offers accuracy up to ±0.5 with a minimum scale reading of 0.1.
  • Easy to Read: Clear display without the harmful effects of mercury.
  • Memory Function: Stores previous measurements for reference.

 

How to Check Fever with SmartCure Digital Thermometer

  1. Prepare the Thermometer: Ensure it is clean and disinfected.
  2. Turn On: Press the power button to activate the thermometer.
  3. Measure: Place the thermometer in the required position (oral, underarm, or rectal) and wait for the beep.
  4. Read: Once the beep sounds, read the temperature displayed.
  5. Clean: Rinse with water and disinfect with alcohol after each use.

 

Safety Guide:

  • Avoid submerging the entire device in water.
  • Use the thermometer as directed.
  • Keep out of reach of children.

 

Key Considerations for Purchasing  a Digital Thermometer

Before purchasing a digital thermometer, consider these crucial factors to ensure a wise investment:

  1. Precision: Ensure high accuracy for reliable readings, crucial for health monitoring.
  2. Response Time: Opt for quick readings without sacrificing accuracy.
  3. Ease of Use: Look for an intuitive interface and clear display.
  4. Durability: Choose a robust thermometer for longevity and reliability.
  5. Measurement Range: Ensure it covers the necessary temperature spectrum.
  6. Hygiene: Select easy-to-clean models or those with disposable covers.
  7. Price: Balance cost with features, and check for a reliable warranty.

SmartCure is dedicated to providing high-quality health monitoring devices that ensure accuracy and ease of use. Our digital thermometers are designed with the latest technology to offer reliable and safe temperature measurements for all users.

Clop-G Cream

Manufactured ByZydus Cadila
ContainsClobetasol (0.05 %w/w) + Gentamicin (0.1 %w/w)
Description
Clop-G Cream is a topical medicine that consists of Clobetasol and Gentamycin. It is used to treat many bacterial skin infections. It helps reduce redness, pain, itching, rashes, purulent discharge from the infected site, etc., associated with bacterial skin infections. It works by stopping the growth of bacteria that cause infection and also by reducing the production of chemicals that cause swelling and redness. Clop-G Cream can cause some side effects like burning, irritation, itching and redness at the site of application. Inform your doctor if any of these side effects persist or worsen. Your doctor may recommend a patch test to check whether this medicine is safe for you, before using it on the affected skin. Consult your doctor immediately if you experience allergic symptoms like rashes, abnormal swelling, breathing difficulty etc. Clop-G Cream should be applied as a thin layer on the affected areas of the skin with clean and dry hands. This cream is meant for external use only. Avoid direct contact with your eyes, nose, mouth, or broken skin. Rinse with water immediately if this medicine comes in contact with these areas. While using Clop-G Cream, refrain from touching or scratching your infected skin as it can spread the infection to other areas as well. Clop-G Cream may not be suitable for all people. Consult your doctor before using this medicine if you are pregnant or are breastfeeding. It is recommended to take this medicine only with the doctor's prescription. It may take several days to weeks to improve your condition. Complete the entire treatment course to get its maximum benefits and to prevent the development of bacterial resistance. If your condition does not improve or gets worse, consult your doctor.


Side effects

Major & minor side effects for Clop-G Cream

  • Burning sensation at the application site
     
     
  • Dry skin
     
     
  • Redness of skin
     
     
     
  • Itching or rash
     
     
     

Uses of Clop-G Cream

What is it prescribed for?

  • Bacterial skin infections
    Bacterial skin infections occur when bacteria enter the skin through cuts or scratches and infect the underlying tissues. This leads to conditions such as cellulitis, impetigo ( a contagious skin infection that mainly affects infants and young children), folliculitis (a skin condition in which hair follicles become swollen) that are characterised by redness, warmth, swelling, itching and irritation of the skin. Clop-G Cream is used to kill bacteria and provide relief from symptoms associated with skin infections.
Read Less
Concerns

Commonly asked questions

  • How long does it take for this medicine to take effect?
     
    The amount of time required for Clop-G Cream to start showing its effect is not known.
  • How long do the effects of this medicine last?
     
    The amount of time for which Clop-G Cream remains effective is not known.
  • Is it safe to consume alcohol while taking this medicine?
     
    Interaction with alcohol is unknown. It is advisable to consult your doctor before consumption.
  • Is this a habit forming medicine?
     
    No habit-forming tendencies were reported for Clop-G Cream.
  • Can this medicine be taken during pregnancy?
     
    Clop-G Cream is not recommended for use in pregnancy as no sufficient information is available regarding its safety. If you are pregnant, consult your doctor before using this cream.
  • Can this medicine be taken while breast-feeding?
     
    It is not known whether Clop-G Cream passes into breast milk or not. However, if you are breastfeeding, consult your doctor before using this cream. If this cream is used, your infant should be monitored closely for any side effects like oral thrush or diaper rash.



Allergy

Avoid using Clop-G Cream if you are allergic to it. Serious allergic reactions to this medicine are very rare. However, seek immediate medical attention if you notice any symptoms such as skin rash, hives (itchy eruptions with burning pain), redness of the skin, itching, swelling of the face, lips, or tongue, difficulty breathing, etc.


Warnings for special population
 

Pregnancy

Clop-G Cream is not recommended for use in pregnancy as no sufficient information is available regarding its safety. If you are pregnant, consult your doctor before using this cream.

Breast-feeding

It is not known whether Clop-G Cream passes into breast milk or not. However, if you are breastfeeding, consult your doctor before using this cream. If this cream is used, your infant should be monitored closely for any side effects like oral thrush or diaper rash.
General warnings
 

Chronic application

Use Clop-G Cream for prescribed duration only. Prolonged use of Clop-G Cream may cause thinning of skin at the site of application and skin may become highly prone to infections.

Cushing's syndrome

Prolonged use of Clop-G Cream can cause Cushing's syndrome. It is a disorder in which the body makes too much of a hormone called cortisol. If you experience symptoms like swelling of the face, an increase in blood glucose levels, etc., then consult a doctor immediately.

External use

Clop-G Cream is recommended for external use only. Avoid contact with the eyes, nose, mouth, vagina, or any open wounds while using this cream. Rinse immediately if water if the cream comes in contact with these areas.

Antibiotic resistance

The entire course of treatment with Clop-G Cream should be completed, even if the condition gets better to avoid antibiotic resistance (a condition where microbes evolve mechanisms that protect them from the effects of antibiotics).

Missed Dose

Apply the missed dose of Clop-G Cream as soon as you remember. If it is time for your next dose, skip the missed dose. Do not apply a double dose to make up for the missed dose.

Overdose

An overdose of Clop-G Cream is not likely to cause severe symptoms. However, ingestion of this cream is harmful and you can experience stomach issues, nausea, vomiting etc. In such cases, immediate medical intervention may be required.


Interactions

All drugs interact differently for person to person. You should check all the possible interactions with your doctor before starting any medicine.
Interaction with Alcohol
 
 

Description

Interaction with alcohol is unknown. It is advisable to consult your doctor before consumption.

Instructions

Interaction with alcohol is unknown. It is advisable to consult your doctor before consumption.
Interaction with Medicine
 

Antidiabetic medicines

 

Tretinoin/ Isotretinoin

 
Disease interactions
 

Cushing's syndrome

 
Cushing's syndrome is a disorder in which your body makes too much of a hormone called cortisol. Prolonged use of Clop-G Cream may lead to absorption of this medicine into the body through your skin and cause Cushing's syndrome. Consult your doctor immediately, if you experience symptoms like swelling of the face, increase in blood sugar levels, high blood pressure, etc. Your doctor may adjust the dose of this medicine or prescribe a suitable alternative based on your condition.
Food interactions
 
Information not available.
Lab interactions
 
Information not available.
This is not an exhaustive list of possible drug interactions. You should consult your doctor about all the possible interactions of the drugs you’re taking.


General Instructions

Clop-G Cream is used to treat bacterial skin infections. Apply this cream as a thin layer over the infected area. Clean the infected area gently before applying this cream. Do not use this medicine over open wounds or broken skin. This cream may initially burn or sting as soon as you apply it. Inform your doctor if the burning and stinging sensations persist. Do not touch or scratch the infected area as it can spread the infection to other body parts as well. Do not cover the application area with bandages or other coverings unless specifically instructed by your doctor. Contact your doctor if symptoms do not improve or resolve even after two weeks of use. Keep the medicine away from the reach of children and pets. Ensure that unused medicine is disposed of properly.


Other details

Miscelleneous
 

Usage does not depend on food timings

To be taken as instructed by doctor

Does not cause sleepiness

How it works
Clop-G Cream is composed of Clobetasone and Gentamicin. Clobetasone is a topical corticosteroid. It works by stopping the production of prostaglandins that cause swelling, itching, and redness on your skin. Gentamicin is an antibiotic and it prevents the growth of bacteria.

Pregnant and lactating women should consult their medical practitioner before use. Eno powder can sometimes cause stomach gas and gut irritation. Do not take for more than 14 days. Do not exceed the recommended dose. Read the label carefully before use.

Product Name: Innsaei low pH Daily Gel Cleanser 5.5 (150ml) Buy 1 Get 1 Free
Description:
Innsaei Low pH Daily Gel Cleanser (150ml) - Buy 1 Get 1 Free

The Innsaei Low pH Daily Gel Cleanser is a gentle yet effective cleanser formulated to maintain the skin's natural balance while providing a thorough cleanse. With a low pH of 5.5, this gel cleanser is designed for daily use, making it suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.

 

Key Features:

  • Low pH Formula: With a pH level of 5.5, this cleanser helps maintain the skin’s natural barrier, preventing dryness and irritation.
  • Gentle Cleansing Agents: Formulated with mild surfactants that cleanse without stripping the skin of its natural oils.
  • Hydrating Ingredients: Enriched with moisturizing agents to keep the skin hydrated and comfortable after cleansing.
  • Refreshing Gel Texture: The gel consistency provides a refreshing cleanse, leaving the skin feeling clean and invigorated.

 

How to Use:

  1. Wet Your Face: Start by wetting your face with lukewarm water.
  2. Apply Cleanser: Squeeze a small amount of the gel cleanser into your palms and lather it up.
  3. Massage: Gently massage the cleanser onto your face in circular motions for about 30 seconds.
  4. Rinse Thoroughly: Rinse your face thoroughly with lukewarm water, ensuring all product is removed.
  5. Pat Dry: Use a clean towel to gently pat your face dry.

 

Benefits:

  • Maintains Skin Balance: The low pH helps preserve the skin's natural acidity, which is essential for overall skin health.
  • Suitable for Daily Use: Gentle enough for everyday use without causing irritation or dryness.
  • Removes Impurities: Effectively removes dirt, makeup, and excess oil, leaving the skin fresh and clean.
  • Hydrating: Keeps the skin moisturized and helps prevent the tight, dry feeling often associated with traditional cleansers.

Made in Bangladesh

Information about Hicks Round Blood Sterile Lancets

Hicks Round Lancets is widely used in hospitals and clinics for taking blood samples. It is highly appreciated by the clients for its painless usages. A pointed piece of surgical steel encased in plastic is used to puncture the skin on one’s finger.

Uses:

Lancets are small needles that are used to prick the skin to obtain a blood sample.

Product Specifications and Features:

  • Consistent depth penetration

Description:
Composition

Each teaspoon full (5 ml) of Herbal cough syrup contains the extracts of-

  • Adhatoda vasica 0.68 gm
  • Piper longum 0.14 gm
  • Glycyrrhiza glabra 6.78 mg
  • Zingiber officinale 6.78 mg
  • Piper nigrum 6.78 mg
  • Terminalia chebula 73.00 mg
  • Saussurea lappa 6.78 mg
  • Syzygium aromaticum 6.78 mg
  • Elettaria cardamomum 6.78 mg
  • Cinnamomum zeylanicum 6.78 mg
  • Cinnamomum tamala 6.78 mg
  • Pistacia integerrima 6.78 mg
  • Myrica nagi 6.78 mg

Indications

This herbal cough syrup liquefies phlegm, It soothes irritation of throat and helps relieve hoarseness. It is a very effective treatment option for all types of cough such as dry irritable cough, allergic & smokers cough.

Therapeutic Class

Herbal and Nutraceuticals

Pharmacology

This syrup is a combination of the traditional herb specially indicated for the treatment of all types of cough. All the herbs used in the syrup are standardized and clinically proven effective to relief cough with potent anti-allergic properties. This is an ideal cough syrup as it is a non-sedating, non-alcoholic, non-constipating and safe for paediatric patients. It is free of side effects like drowsiness and dry mouth.

Dosage & Administration

Adult: 3 teaspoonful (15 ml) 2-3 times a day.

Side Effects

Herbal medicine is clinically proven as safe and well tolerated. In the recommended dose side-effects are rare. But, in high dose diarrhea, vomiting may occur.

Pregnancy & Lactation

The safety of the components used in this herbal cough syrup has not been studied in pregnancy. It is not known whether this product passes into breast milk. Therefore, the drug should be used with caution during pregnancy and breastfeeding.

Precautions & Warnings

Caution needed if use in pregnancy and lactation.

Overdose Effects

Symptoms of overdose may include diarrhea and vomiting.

Storage Conditions

Keep out of reach of the children. Keep away from direct sunlight; store in a cool and dry place.

Laikou Sakura Mud Mask - 5g - Deep Cleansing & Hydrating Skincare

 

The Sakura Mud Mask - 5g is a compact yet powerful skincare treatment designed to offer deep cleansing and intense hydration. This mud mask acts as a makeup remover and pores cleanser, infused with natural plant ingredients that are gentle and non-irritating. It effectively controls oil, reduces spots, and balances the skin’s secretion of water and oil for a smooth and delicate complexion.

 

Experience the transformative power of the Laikou Sakura Mud Mask. This luxurious formula harnesses the purifying properties of volcanic mud to deeply cleanse and unclog pores, while the hydrating essence of sakura extract replenishes essential moisture. Enjoy a visibly clearer, smoother, and more radiant complexion as this mask effectively controls oil, minimizes pore appearance, and brightens your skin. Say goodbye to impurities and hello to a revitalized, glowing you.

 

Product Key Information 

 

Attribute Details
Brand/Manufacturer Name Laikou
Type Mud Mask
Top Features Deep Cleansing, Hydration, Oil Control, Pore Minimizing
Size 5g
Count 1 Sachet
Application Face
Used for Deep Cleansing, Hydration, Oil Control
Other Information Suitable for all skin types

 

Benefits

 

  • Deep Cleansing: Effectively removes makeup, dirt, and impurities from pores, ensuring a thorough cleanse.
  • Hydration: Deeply replenishes moisture, leaving the skin hydrated and refreshed.
  • Natural Ingredients: Formulated with mild, natural plant extracts that soothe the skin without irritating.
  • Oil Control: Regulates excess oil production, reducing the appearance of spots and giving a matte finish.
  • Pore Minimizing: Tightens and shrinks pores, balancing the skin’s water and oil levels for a healthy glow.

 

Product details of LAIKOU Sakura Mud Mask

  1. Sakura mud mask is a deep-cleansing makeup remover and pores cleanser
  2. Replenishing water deeply into your skin.
  3. Contains a variety of natural plant ingredients, mild and no irritation.
  4. Oil control and reduce the spots on the skin surface to make your face smooth and delicate.
  5. Cleansing deeply, remove dirt, and shrink pores.
  6. Balance the skin secretion of water and oil

 

Customers have praised the Sakura Mud Mask - 5g for its deep-cleansing and hydrating properties. Users report noticeable improvements in skin clarity and texture, with many highlighting its ability to control oil and reduce spots. The natural ingredients and gentle formula make it suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.

 

How to Use Sakura Mud Mask

 

  1. Apply a layer of mud to clean the skin, avoiding the eye and lip areas.
  2. Leave on for 10-15 minutes or until dry.
  3. Rinse with clean water, pat dry with a clean cloth, and then apply moisturizer.
  4. Use 3 to 4 times a week for best results.

Description:
Laikou Matcha Mud Mask – Deep Cleansing & Revitalizing Face Mask

The Laikou Matcha Mud Mask is a skincare product designed to cleanse, detoxify, and refresh the skin. Infused with matcha, this mask helps eliminate toxins, tighten pores, and brighten the complexion, leaving your skin feeling smooth and revitalized. 

 

The Laikou Matcha Mud Mask stands out for its ability to detoxify and nourish your skin, all at an affordable price. Whether you have oily, dry, or combination skin, this mask is designed to suit all skin types and give you a refreshed look with regular use.

 

  • Deep Cleansing: Removes impurities, excess oil, and toxins from deep within your pores.
  • Exfoliation: Gently exfoliates dead skin cells, leaving your skin soft and smooth.
  • Pore Tightening: Minimizes the appearance of large pores for a more refined complexion.
  • Brightening: Matcha helps in reducing dark spots, brightening your skin over time.
  • Anti-aging: Packed with antioxidants, the mask helps combat signs of aging by reducing wrinkles and fine lines.

 

Product Features: Laikou Matcha Mud Mask

 

  1. Deep Hydration with Green Tea Moisture: Formulated with freshly squeezed green tea, this mask provides deep hydration, replenishing water into your skin to keep it moisturized and healthy.

  2. Natural and Gentle Ingredients: Enriched with a blend of natural plant extracts, it is mild and non-irritating, making it suitable for all skin types, even sensitive skin.

  3. Oil Control & Spot Reduction: Controls excess oil production while reducing the appearance of spots and blemishes, leaving your face smoother and more refined.

  4. Deep Cleansing and Pore Shrinking: The mask penetrates deep into the skin, effectively removing dirt, impurities, and excess oils, while shrinking enlarged pores for a more even complexion.

  5. Repair Dryness and Fine Lines: By replenishing moisture, this mask helps repair dry lines caused by dehydration, giving your skin a softer and smoother texture.

  6. Nourishes and Replenishes: Infused with essential nutrients, it nourishes the skin while locking in moisture, keeping your face hydrated and refreshed throughout the day.

  7. Enhances Skin Elasticity: Regular use of this mask helps restore skin elasticity, reducing the appearance of fine lines and leaving your skin firmer and more youthful.

  8. Smooth and Delicate Skin: With its deep moisturizing and cleansing properties, this mask leaves your skin feeling soft, supple, and revitalized.

 

Benefits of Laikou Matcha Mud Mask

 

1. Deep Detox and Antioxidant Protection

 

This Matcha Green Tea Clay Mask deeply detoxifies your skin, drawing out toxins, impurities, and excess oils, leaving your face looking flawless and hydrated. Matcha's natural minerals not only cleanse but also tone and moisturize, making your skin feel silky smooth. Regular use delivers powerful antioxidant benefits, helping to delay signs of aging such as wrinkles and fine lines.

 

2. 100% Natural, Chemical-Free Formula

 

Made with a blend of organic Matcha, aloe vera, volcanic mud, and tea tree oil, this mask contains no synthetic chemicals, fragrances, or parabens. It’s cruelty-free, ensuring that you treat your skin with nature’s best ingredients, perfect for supporting brighter, smoother, and younger-looking skin.

 

3. Ideal for Acne-Prone Skin

 

If you have acne-prone or oily skin, this green tea mask is perfect for you. The natural clay and tea tree oil help to unclog pores, reduce redness, and calm acne flare-ups, giving you clearer and healthier skin with consistent use.

 

4. Safe and Gentle for All Skin Types

 

This Matcha Green Tea Face Mask is crafted to suit all skin types, especially acne-prone and sensitive skin. Whether you’re battling breakouts or looking to nourish and detoxify, this mask provides a natural solution free from harmful chemicals.

 

5. Customer Satisfaction Guaranteed

 

We stand behind the quality of our product. If you’re not satisfied with your purchase, our 24/7 customer support is always available to assist you. We’re committed to ensuring your skin looks and feels its best.

 

How to Use

 

  • Step 1: Apply an even layer of the mask to clean, dry skin.
  • Step 2: Leave on for 10-15 minutes or until dry.
  • Step 3: Gently rinse with warm water, pat dry, and follow up with your favorite moisturizer.

 

For best results, use 2-3 times a week for glowing, smooth, and refreshed skin‡•§

Description:
Description
In the Antiseptic cream category, Savlon Cream provides a 2 step solution for germ protection. It treats any wound in the skin and helps to heal the wound quicker by speeding-up the 3 phases of wound closing- Inflammation, Tissue Formation and Tissue Remodeling. It serves the dual purpose of soothing the skin and providing protection against germs as well.



Product Information
Savlon Antiseptic Cream contains effective germ-killing and cleansing agents.

Use Savlon Antiseptic Cream on cuts, scratches, blisters, grazes, windburn, sunburn, nappy rash, insect bites, cracked and itchy skin.

It is the smooth moisturizing cream base is mild, soothing, and healing.



Contraindications
Known hypersensitivity to the product or any of its components, especially in
those with a history of possible chlorhexidine digluconate-related allergic
reactions



Special warnings and precautions for use
For external use only.
Avoid contact with the eyes, middle ear, meninges and other nervous tissue.
If accidentally splashed into the eye, the open eye should be irrigated for at least 10
minutes.
Keep all medicines away from children.
If symptoms persist, stop using and consult your doctor.
The product is incompatible with anionic substances (e.g. soap)
Information concerning excipients


Overdose
While accidental ingestion is unlikely to cause any systemic effects due to the poor
absorption of Chlorhexidine digluconate and cetrimide, ingestion of high
concentrations may cause esophageal damage and necrosis with symptoms such as
nausea and vomiting. Cetrimide has depolarising muscle relaxant properties and toxic
symptoms include dyspnoea and cyanosis due to paralysis of the respiratory muscles,
possibly leading to asphyxia. CNS depression (sometimes preceded by excitement
and convulsions), hypotension, coma, and death may also occur.



Therapeutic indications
The cleansing and prevention of infection in all types of lesions, ranging from
minor skin disorders or blisters, to minor burns and small wounds.



Special precautions for storage
Store below 25°C.



Manufacturer Name
ACI Consumer Products.

Product Name: Cerave Moisturising Cream for Normal to Dry Skin
Description:
While a compromised skin barrier can lead to dryness and itching, a moisturizing cream with hyaluronic acid and ceramides can help. By hydrating the skin and restoring its natural barrier, a cream with these ingredients can help those with even dry to very dry skin improve the look and feel of their skin.
 
CeraVe Moisturizing Cream includes 3 essential ceramides that work together to lock in skins moisture and help restore your skin’s protective barrier. MVE technology encapsulates ceramides to ensure efficient delivery within the skin’s barrier and slow release over time. Supporting your protective skin barrier, long after you’ve finish applying. Developed with dermatologists and suitable for dry and very dry skin on the face and body, this rich, non-greasy, fast-absorbing moisturizing cream features our patented MVE Delivery Technology to release a steady stream of moisturizing ingredients throughout the day and night. CeraVe Moisturizing Cream with ceramides is fragrance free.

 

Product Features:

  • ALL DAY HYDRATION : Provides 24-hour hydration and helps restore the protective skin barrier with three essential ceramides (1,3,6-II)
  • MOISTURE-RETAINING INGREDIENTS : Formulated with hyaluronic acid to help retain skin’s natural moisture
  • PATENTED TECHNOLOGY : Utilizes patented MVE controlled-release technology to help replenish ceramides and deliver long lasting moisturization
  • GENTLE ON SKIN : Free of fragrance and oil, hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic and non-irritating
  • HYDRATES WITHOUT CLOGGING PORES : Ideal for normal to dry skin

 

Ingredients:
Aqua / Water / Eau, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetyl Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Petrolatum, Potassium Phosphate, Ceramide Np, Ceramide Ap, Ceramide Eop, Carbomer, Dimethicone, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cholesterol, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium Edta, Dipotassium Phosphate, Tocopherol, Phytosphingosine, Xanthan Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin

 

Instructions:
Follow the skin care 5-Step Regimen

Step 1: Cleanse – Wash your face with a gentle Cleanser/Facewash accordingly to your skin type.

Step 2: Tone – Toner helps to calmed and balanced skin pH after cleansing.

Step 3: Treat – Serum/Facial Oil/Essence contain useful nutrients — for your skin.

Step 4: Moisturize – Cerave Moisturizing Cream For Normal To Dry Skin
Apply a moderate amount of product on the face. Gently pat until the product penetrates the skin

Step 5: Sun Care – Apply Sunscreen to protect skin from UV Ray  (Day time only)

Adhatoda vasica, Syrup.

Adovas® is a sugar free, non sedating herbal cough syrup. It liquefies phlegm. It is effective for all kinds of common cold and cough such as, dry irritable cough, allergic cough, smokers cough and cough associated with bronchitis. It soothens the throat irritation and relieves hoarseness.

Dosage & Administration:
Adults: 3 tea spoonfuls (15 ml) 2-3 times a day. In acute cough warm water can be added for better result.
Children under 12 years of age: 1-2 teaspoonful (5-10 ml) 3 times a day.

Smartcure Flexible Tip Digital Thermometer: Easy and Accurate Temperature Measurement

 

The Smartcure Flexible Tip Digital Thermometer is designed for ease and precision in measuring body temperature. With a flexible tip, this thermometer ensures comfort during use in various positions such as oral, rectal, and under the armpit. The device features dependable accuracy, ensuring temperature readings within ±0.1°C, and an easy-to-read clear LCD display.

 

Product Highlights

  • Flexible tip for comfortable use.
  • Dependable accuracy within ±0.1°C.
  • Clear LCD display for easy reading.
  • Beeping sound to indicate measurement completion.
  • Automatic shut off for energy saving.
  • Multi-use: oral, rectal, and underarm.

 

How to Use:

  1. Prepare the Thermometer: Ensure the thermometer is clean.
  2. Turn On: Press the power button to switch on the device.
  3. Measure: Place the thermometer in the desired position (oral, rectal, or underarm) and wait for 60 seconds.
  4. Read: Once the beep sounds, read the temperature on the clear LCD display.
  5. Clean: Rinse the flexible tip with water and disinfect after each use.

 

Safety Guide:

  • Do not immerse the entire thermometer in water.
  • Use the thermometer according to the instructions.
  • Keep out of reach of children.

 

Box Contains:

  • 1 Digital Thermometer (including battery)
  • Storage case
  • Manual

 

Measurement Range:

  • Range: 89.6 - 109.4°F (32 - 43°C)
 

About the Brand:

SmartCure Limited is known for producing reliable and easy-to-use health monitoring devices. Our flexible tip digital thermometers are designed for accuracy and user comfort, ensuring you get precise temperature readings every time.

This comprehensive product description ensures that potential customers are well-informed about the features and benefits of the Smartcure Flexible Tip Digital Thermometer, enhancing their shopping experience and improving search engine visibility.

Description:
Indications
Insect bites, sunburn, disinfection, cuts, scratches, blisters, grazes, nappy rash, cracked and itchy skin, cleansing and irrigating the skin, or unclean wounds are all indications for Cetrimide & Chlorhexidine Hydrochloride.

Pharmaceutical Name
ACI Limited

Pharmacology
Cetrimide is a quaternary ammonium antiseptic that is effective against gram-positive and gram-negative bacteria. Chlorhexidine is an antibacterial substance that kills gram-positive and gram-negative vegetative bacteria, yeasts, dermatophyte fungi, and lipophilic viruses.

Dosage & Administration
Adult and children: Apply 2-3 times daily or as directed.

Contraindications
This product should not be used in the eyes, ears, mucous membranes, or bodily cavities.

Side Effects
The use of this product on a regular basis may cause skin irritation.

Pregnancy & Lactation
Pregnancy Classification C. Although animal reproduction studies have revealed that the medicine has a negative effect on the fetus, and there are no suitable and well-controlled human research, the drug's potential advantages may justify its usage in pregnant women despite the dangers.

Precautions & Warnings
Hypersensitivity reactions can be exacerbated by prolonged and frequent use. Antibacterial efficacy may be reduced by blood, soap, cotton, or other organic materials.

Therapeutic Class
Preparations containing chlorhexidine and chloroxylenol

Storage Conditions
Protect from light and store below 30° C in a dry area. Do not freeze or refrigerate. Keep out of children's reach.

Generic
Chlorhexidine Hydrochloride + Cetrimide

  • Irregular White To Brown Patches, Which Occur On The Exposed Area Of Body (Tinea Versicolor)

Ketoconazole, Aqua, Sodium laureth sulfate, Polyquaternium-10, Betaine, Amodimethicone, Perfume

Description:
The MCP Rubber Hot Water Bag is a must-have for anyone seeking effective heat therapy. Manufactured with high-quality rubber, this water bag is not only durable but also resistant to high water pressure, ensuring a safe and comfortable experience. Whether you're dealing with muscular cramps, joint pain, menstrual discomfort, or backaches, this hot water bag provides soothing warmth to relieve tension and pain.

The bag is leak-proof and easy to clean, making it a practical choice for daily use. Its ability to retain heat for extended periods means you won’t need to refill it frequently. The bright, colorful design adds a touch of vibrancy to your pain relief routine, while its ease of use makes it suitable for all ages.

 

Product Key Specifications

 

Attribute Details
Brand/Manufacturer MCP
Authorized Seller Global Medical Shop
Material High-quality Rubber
Top Features Leak-proof, Durable, Long-lasting heat retention
Size Standard hot water bag size
Usage Heat therapy for pain relief
Application Areas Muscular pain, joint pain, menstrual cramps, stomach aches, back pain

 

 

Usage Instructions

  1. Fill the bag with hot water (not boiling).
  2. Secure the cap tightly.
  3. Apply to the affected area for heat therapy.
  4. After use, empty the water and store it in a dry place.

 

Safety Guide

  • Do not use boiling water to prevent burns.
  • Ensure the cap is tightly sealed to avoid leaks.
  • Store the bag in a cool, dry place when not in use.
  • Keep out of reach of children when filled with hot water.

 

 What is a hot water bag used for?

A hot water bag provides warmth and relief from various types of body pain, including muscle aches, cramps, and joint stiffness. It is commonly used to alleviate menstrual pain, sore muscles, and general discomfort caused by colds or flu.

 

 How long does a hot water bag stay warm?

A hot water bag can typically retain heat for about 1-2 hours, depending on the water temperature and the ambient conditions. Using an insulated cover or wrapping it in a thick towel can help it stay warm longer, which is useful during Bangladesh's chilly winter nights.

 

What type of water should I use in the hot water bag?

Use clean, hot tap water that is not boiling (ideally between 40-50°C or 104-122°F). Boiling water can damage the bag material and pose a burn risk.

 

Can I sleep with a hot water bag?

It’s not recommended to sleep with a hot water bag due to the risk of leaks or burns. If you need overnight warmth, consider a heating pad with an auto shut-off function.

 

How much water should I fill in the hot water bag?

Fill the bag about halfway to two-thirds full, leaving room for the air to escape as you secure the cap. This reduces pressure on the seams and minimizes the risk of leakage.

 

Is it safe to use a hot water bag during pregnancy?

Yes, it can be safe for targeted use, such as to relieve back pain or muscle cramps. However, consult with a healthcare provider before use, and avoid prolonged exposure, especially to the abdomen.

 

How often should I replace a hot water bag?

Replace the hot water bag every 1-2 years, or sooner if there are signs of wear, leaks, or damage. Frequent users may need to replace it more often to ensure safe use.

 

Can children use a hot water bag?

Yes, but with caution. Always supervise children and wrap the hot water bag in a cloth to prevent burns.

Apple Cider Vinegar
Apple Cider Vinegar (ACV) is made from apples.
Fleischmann’s Apple Cider Vinegar (Karkuma Brand in Bangladesh) is made with the finest, most delicious, nutritious & organically grown apples. Acetic acid is the key ingredient of all vinegar. Acetic acid is what gives vinegar its distinctive sour taste and pungent smell.

Mother of Apple Cider Vinegar
The mother of ACV is a combination of cellulose and a mixture of bacteria used in the second fermentation process. It is what gives the product its cloudy appearance and can also be seen as floating strands. Eventually, it will settle on the bottom of the bottle.  Organic ACV retains the mother and will remain cloudy.

Product Name: BEAUTE Melasma X Glutathione Brightening Tone Up Cream
Description:
The BEAUTE Melasma-X Glutathione Brightening Tone Up Cream 45ml offers a comprehensive solution. This cream is designed to brighten your complexion, reduce dark spots, and provide an even skin tone. Infused with glutathione, it not only enhances your skin's radiance but also provides anti-aging benefits.

 

Key Benefits

  • Brightening Your Skin: The glutathione in the cream works to lighten dark spots and promote a brighter complexion.
  • Instant Tone Up Effect: Achieve an immediate glow and even out your skin tone with the tone-up effect.
  • Moisturizing: Keeps your skin hydrated and supple with ingredients like glycerin and butylene glycol.
  • Anti-Aging Properties: Helps in managing wrinkles and fine lines, making your skin look youthful.
  • Freckles and Melasma Care: Specifically targets melasma and freckles to give you clear and smooth skin.
  • Repair Dark Circles and Pimples: Reduces the appearance of dark circles and heals pimple spots and other dark areas.

 

Ingredients

This cream combines powerful active ingredients to provide a multifaceted approach to skincare:

  • Glutathione (100ppm): A potent antioxidant known for its skin-brightening properties.
  • Niacinamide: Helps in improving skin elasticity, enhancing the barrier function, evening out skin tone, and reducing dullness.
  • Arbutin: Reduces melanin production, helping to fade dark spots and pigmentation.
  • Centella Asiatica Extract: Known for its healing properties, it helps to soothe and repair the skin.
  • Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract (Green Tea): Provides antioxidant benefits and reduces inflammation.

 

How to Use

  1. Cleanse: Start with a clean face. Use a gentle cleanser suitable for your skin type.
  2. Tone: Apply a toner to balance your skin's pH and prepare it for the cream.
  3. Apply: Take a small amount of the BEAUTE Melasma-X Glutathione Brightening Tone Up Cream and apply it evenly across your face, focusing on areas with visible hyperpigmentation or melasma.
  4. Massage: Gently massage the cream into your skin using upward circular motions until fully absorbed.
  5. Moisturize and Protect: Follow up with your regular moisturizer and sunscreen during the day.

For best results, use the cream twice daily, in the morning and evening.

 

Users have shared overwhelmingly positive feedback about this cream. They report significant improvements in skin brightness, reduction in melasma, and overall skin texture. The instant tone-up effect is particularly appreciated, providing an immediate boost in radiance. The BEAUTE Melasma-X Glutathione Brightening Tone Up Cream is an excellent choice for anyone looking to address issues like melasma, pigmentation, and dull skin. Its powerful ingredients and multifunctional benefits make it a valuable addition to any skincare routine. Ensure consistent use for the best results, and enjoy a brighter, more even complexion.

Composition

Each 5 ml contains-

  • Neem (Azadirachta indica): 1.25 mg
  • Turmeric (Curcuma longa): 1.25 mg
  • Basil (Ocimum sanctum): 2.50 mg
  • Wormwood (Artemisia absinthium): 2 mg
  • Senna (Cassia angustifolia): 17 mg
  • Indian Rhubarb (Rheum emodi): 13 mg
  • Wild Senna (Cassia occidentalis): 12.5 mg
  • Rose (Rosa damascena): 2 mg
  • East Indian Globe Thistle(Sphaeranthus indicus): 2 mg
  • Fumitory (Fumaria officinalis): 2 mg
  • Chiretta (Swertia chirata): 1.25 mg

Blood impurities

Pharmacology

This preparation is a versatile polypharmaceutical herbal medicine prepared with valuable medicinal plants that cleanses entire system of the body. The unique mixing of all the ingredients as per Hamdard Pharmacopoeia of Eastern medicine gives the optimum concentration of important vitamins, elements like Fe, Ca, Zn, Mg, Na, Mn, Ni, Cu, Al, Ba, etc. for protection of different organs, maintenance vital function of the body and prevention of diseases. Extensive use of this preparation to the millions of patients since 1939 in different hospitals and clinics around the world specially in India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Nepal, Middle East, USA and Europe proved its efficacy to various skin diseases. It increases the cell-mediated immune response. This preparation inhibits the growth of bacteria and fungi. This preparation is useful as a diuretic, preventing problems arising from change of season.

Precautions & Warnings

Indications

Biotin is indicated in-

  • Hair loss
  • Weak, brittle, splitting or soft nails
  • Eczema & dermatitis.

Pharmacology

Biotin is an essential vitamin that is also known as vitamin H. It is involved in vital physiological function like fatty acid synthesis, amino acid catabolism and gluconeogenesis. It acts as a cofactor in the enzymatic carboxylation of pyruvate and acetyl-CoA. Biotin influences the growth and differentiation of epidermal cells and is therefore important for the formation and renewal of the skin, hair and nails. It functions as a coenzyme for mitochondrial carboxylases in hair roots and improves the keratin structure. Biotin deficiency may result in hair loss and a variety of systemic symptoms such as dermatitis, and aciduria. Biotin is one of the most prescribed nutritional supplements for any kind of hair loss.

Dosage & Administration

Biotin dose varies depending on disease condition and age group.

¬†

In adults: Generally 1-3 tablets per day or as advised by the physician.

¬†

In children: biotin deficiency affects between 1 week and 2 years of age and usually exhibits seizures, hypotonia, developmental delay, ataxia, hyperventilation, and coma. In this case, 5-10 tablets daily, crushed and mixed with water or any kind of fruit juice or as advised by the physician.

¬†

Recommended dietary allowance:

¬†

Infants-

  • 0-6 months: 5 mcg/day
  • 7-12 months: 6 mcg/day

Children-

  • 1-3 years: 8 mcg/day
  • 4-8 years: 12 mcg/day

Males and females-

  • 9-13 years: 20 mcg/day
  • 14-18 years: 25 mcg/day
  • ‚â•19 years: 30 mcg/day

Pregnancy: 30 mcg/day

¬†

Lactation: 35 mcg/day

* ‡¶ö‡¶ø‡¶ï‡¶ø‡ßé‡¶∏‡¶ï‡ßá‡¶∞ ‡¶™‡¶∞‡¶æ‡¶Æ‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶∂ ‡¶Æ‡ßã‡¶§‡¶æ‡¶¨‡ßá‡¶ï ‡¶î‡¶∑‡¶ß ‡¶∏‡ßá‡¶¨‡¶® ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡ßÅ‡¶®'

Interaction

There are indications that anticonvulsant drugs lower the plasma level of biotin. Antibiotic use may decrease the biotin contribution to the body made by the microflora of the large intestine. Excessive consumption of raw egg whites interferes with biotin absorption.

Contraindications

Contraindicated in patients with known hypersensitivity to any of the ingredients.

Side Effects

Well tolerated in the recommended dose. No biotin toxicity has been reported in individuals supplemented with as much as 200 mg orally or 20mg intravenously per day.

Pregnancy & Lactation

Sufficient clinical data is not available to use in pregnant women and lactating mother.

Therapeutic Class

Herbal and Nutraceuticals

Storage Conditions

Store in a cool and dry place, away from light and moisture. Keep out of reach of children.

Description:
Generic

Qurs Muhazzil

 

Indications

Qurs Mulayin is a prebiotic, which means it increases the growth or activity of probiotics (good bacteria) in the digestive tract, which is said to be good for your health.

Peristaltic action is aided by Qurs Mulayin.

Qurs Mulayin reduces constipation by acting as a moderate laxative.

Qurs Mulayin cleanses the colon and restores its functionality.

Qurs Mulayin helps to relieve flatulence and cramps.

Irritable bowel syndrome can be relieved with Qurs Mulayin (IBS).

Qurs Mulayin aids in the relief of colic.

Qurs Mulayin improves nutrition absorption from the gastrointestinal system.

The digestive and neurological systems are tonified by Qurs Mulayin.

Chronic headaches are relieved with Qurs Mulayin.

 

Pharmacology

By promoting peristaltic motions, Qurs Mulayin is an excellent herbal treatment for constipation relief. Constipation is defined as the slow passage of feces through the large intestine. It is frequently linked with huge amounts of dry, hard feces in the descending colon, which accumulated due to the extended time available for fluid absorption. Defecation may be highly unpleasant or difficult for a sufferer. Qurs Mulayin promotes peristalsis and softens the stool for easier laxation.

 

Dosage & Administration

1-2 tablet(s) with lukewarm water once daily or as prescribed by the physician.

 

Contraindications

There is no known contraindication.

 

Side Effects

In therapeutic dosage, no notable negative effects have been reported.

 

Precautions & Warnings

Nutraceuticals and herbal remedies

 

Therapeutic Class

Herbal and Nutraceuticals

 

Storage Conditions

Protect yourself from the sun. Store in a cool, dry location. Before using, give it a good shake.

  3. Soft bristles: Soft bristles effectively clean teeth without hurting gum.
  4. Rubber Handle: Firm Grip Handle for better control.

Indications

Magnesium Oxide is indicated in-

  • Relieving the symptoms of magnesium deficiency.
  • Rapid or irregular heart rate, heart attack, angina pectoris, mild or severe hypertension.
  • Tetania, muscle cramp, gastrointestinal cramps, stress, increased stimulability of muscles and nerves, call cramps, and cramp in newborn and young children.
  • Gynecological diseases, cervical insufficiency, eclampsia, pre-eclampsia, tocolysis, dysmenorrhea.
  • Calcification and ossification
  • Prevention of kidney stone formation
  • Diabetes treatment and migraine

Pharmacology

Magnesium belongs to the group of drugs called mineral support products. It occurs in nature in the form of the mineral periclase. Magnesium is required for energy production, oxidative phosphorylation, and glycolysis. In its purest form, magnesium oxide is a colorless or white crystalline material or very fine powder, with no odor and a bitter taste.

¬†

Magnesium helps to regulate diverse biochemical reactions in the body, including protein synthesis, muscle and nerve function, blood glucose control, and blood pressure regulation. It contributes to the structural development of bone and is required for the synthesis of DNA, RNA, and the antioxidant glutathione. Magnesium also plays a role in the active transport of calcium and potassium ions across cell membranes, a process that is important to nerve impulse conduction, muscle contraction, and normal heart rhythm.

¬†

Distribution: The volume of distribution of magnesium is 13.65 to 49.00 L

Excretion: The majority of magnesium is excreted renally.

Dosage & Administration

The recommended daily dose for adults and adolescents (12-17 years) is 1-2 tablets.

Interaction

Aminoquinolones, Nitrofurantoin, Penicillamine, Tetracyclines, Fluoroquinolones, Digoxin, Lithium, Sodium polystyrene sulfonate, Nifedipine etc.

Contraindications

Hypersensitivity and severe renal impairment.

Side Effects

  • Stomach upset and diarrhea
  • Hypermagnesaemia
  • Paralytic ileus
  • Hyper-excitability
  • Muscle weakness
  • Sleepiness

Pregnancy & Lactation

It should be used as directed by the physician during pregnancy and lactation.

Precautions & Warnings

Before taking a magnesium supplement, tell your doctor or pharmacist if you are allergic to it.

Overdose Effects

Symptoms of overdose may include slow heartbeat, severe dizziness, confusion, muscle weakness, loss of consciousness, diarrhea and hypermagnesemia.

Therapeutic Class

Antacids, Electrolytes preparations, Oral electrolytes preparations

Storage Conditions

Keep out of reach of children. Store in a dry place, below 25¬∞C temperature, and protected Irom light.

¬†
