Indications
Panax Ginseng capsule is indicated to reduce fatigue and stress, increase vitality strengthens immunity, while recovering after long term fever and weakness, as a stimulant, enhance libido, increase physical endurance, prevents impotence, adjuvant therapy for diabetes. Posses antioxidant property.Primary Uses-
  • Adaptogen and general tonic
  • Increased athletic performance and endurance
  • Immunomodulatory effects
Other Potential Uses-
  • Aphrodisiac; erectile dysfunction and fertility
  • Menopausal symptoms
  • Non-insulin dependent diabetes mellitus
  • Improved pulmonary function in treatment of severe, chronic respiratory disease; additive effect of antibiotic treatment for respiratory tract infection
Therapeutic Class
Herbal and Nutraceuticals
Description
Ginseng is valued as a medicine in China for over 2,000 years. The active ingredients in Ginseng are a set of compounds called ginsenosides. These complex chemicals have a variety of effects, ranging from stimulation of the nervous system to reduction of blood sugar levels. The herb also has an antioxidant effect, stimulates the immune system, thins the blood, and reduces LDL the "bad" cholesterol levels.
Pharmacology
Ginseng is an all-natural & clinically shown to increase body's oxygen uptake which is necessary to help make healthy energy. The pharmacological effects a) adaptogenic b) improvement of physical & mental performance. In human, some evidence suggests that ginseng can improve glycogen utilization, alcohol clearance, serum lipid level, and other metabolic parameters, which is taken as evidence of a pro-homeostasis, adaptogenic effect.
Dosage & Administration
One Panax Ginseng capsule one or two times a day or advised by the physician
Contraindications
Ginseng can be taken with any other vitamin, minerals or herbal supplement. No known contraindications according to the German E Commission and World Health Organization (WHO). However, as with any supplement, consult with physician if you are taking prescription drugs.
Side Effects
Over Ginseng's many years of use, no serious side effects or drug interactions have been reported.
Pregnancy & Lactation
No known restrictions according to the American Herbal Products Association and the German E Commission, but controlled, long-term safety studies are lacking. In Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM), ginseng root is included in prescriptions given during pregnancy, labor and postpartum.
Precautions & Warnings
Over stimulation and insomnia have also been reported with ginseng and anecdotal evidence suggests that excessive doses may mildly elevate blood pressure and/or cause hyper sexuality. Safety in young children or individuals with severe hepatic or renal disease is not known.
Storage Conditions
Keep below 30¬∞C temperature, away from light & moisture. Keep out of the reach of children.

Product Name: Derma Roller System 540 Needles Derma for Face and Skin Care - 0.75mm
Description:
What is Derma roller?  The Derma roller is a small, easy-to-use device that at its end has a roller fitted with tiny titanium needles. Glided over the skin it performs a mechanical stimulation that causes micro-injuries. These tiny punctures create microchannels that allow you to reach the deepest part of the dermis.

Derma roller microneedles have various sizes, but their functions are essentially the same. The length can range from 1.0mm to 2.0mm, depending on the skin problem to be treated. The longer the length, the better the results.

What applications does it have?  The Derma roller is a device specially designed for the reduction of wrinkles, skin rejuvenation, sagging areas of the face or body, hyperpigmentation, stretch marks, scars caused by acne, reduction of cellulite and reduction of hair loss.

The Derma roller can also be used as a catalyst to optimize the effects of creams or serums, inducing better absorption of the active ingredients and taking them to a deeper level of the dermis.

How does it work?  Its operation is very simple. The Derma roller must slide by pressing on the area to be treated in several directions, so that it penetrates the skin very subtly. In this mechanical stimulation, a cylinder is rolled with small titanium micro needles that cause micro lesions on the skin.

What benefits does it offer?

The natural response to the mechanical action exerted by the Derma roller causes the cells to reactivate and the skin to repair itself, through the production of collagen and elastin. In this way, the body recovers these substances responsible for giving our skin a smooth, shiny and smooth appearance.

The Derma Roller offers faster and more visible results than topical skin application treatments, increasing the absorption of active ingredients by up to 500%.

Regarding the stimulation of collagen and elastic production (which contribute to the elimination of wrinkles and scars).

Does the application of the Dermaroller have any reaction?  Logically, after its application, a slight inflammatory reaction of the skin occurs, which is extremely brief and fades significantly within hours. The redness can last an average of 24 hours, depending on the person's pigments.

Easy to rewind and easy to cut by hand makes most convenient for dressings and fixation of medical devices.


Does not damage the skin or medical devices when removing the tapes, ensure optimal safety of patient.

Description:
i-Pill Emergency Contraceptive Pill, very popularly known as the Morning After Pill  is a pill that can be taken after unprotected sex or in case of a failed contraception in order to prevent pregnancy. This pill contains Synthetic Levonorgestrel that delays ovulation, thereby preventing the fertilization of the egg by the sperm, thus preventing pregnancy. For the pill to work, it must be consumed within 72 hours (3 days) of the episode of unprotected sex. The sooner it is consumed, the more effective it is.

Country of origin: INDIA

Benefits of the i-Pill Emergency Contraceptive Pill

  • Contains Synthetic Levonorgestrel
  • Prevents pregnancy by delaying ovulation, thereby preventing the sperm from meeting the egg
  • Highly effective emergency contraception method

Usage

The i-Pill Emergency Contraceptive Pill must be taken within 3 days (72 hours) after unprotected sex or failed contraception. The sooner, the better.

Caution

One should not make a habit of taking these pills as they are hormonal pills and can create havoc with the menstrual cycle of the body, and also the general health of the body. The usage of these pills must be kept at the bare minimum, like once in 6 months.

Composition
Each 5 ml contains-
  • Madar (Calotropis gigantea): 0.20 mg
  • Mace (Myristica fragrans) arillus: 0.23 mg
  • Nutmeg (Myristica fragrans) nut: 0.23 mg
  • Clove (Eugenia caryophyllus): 0.23 mg
  • Pellitory (Anacyclus pyrethrum) root: 0.23 mg
  • Safron (Crocus sativus): 0.07 mg
  • Castoreum: 0.07 mg
Indications
This is indicated in-
  • Sluggishness
  • Feebleness
  • Curvature
  • Shortness
  • Obliquity of male organ.
Therapeutic Class
Herbal and Nutraceuticals
Pharmacology
This is highly effective in sluggishness, feebleness, curvature, shortness and obliquity of male organ. For excessive indulgence in sexual acts or other causes nerve, blood vessel and tissue lost their elasticity and blood cannot store long time in the blood vessel which reduces the erecting time and makes the male organ weak. This preparation strengthens the tissue, stimulates the nerves and muscles as well as the flow of blood in the male organ, thus providing it stiffness and full erection. It also increases the elasticity of male organ.
Contraindications
There is no known contraindication.
Precautions & Warnings
Sexual copulation is strictly prohibited during use. Discontinue if there is any side effect and apply coconut oil on effected portion. Keep out of reach of the children.
Storage Conditions
Store at cool and dry place, protect from light.

Product Name: Morr F 5% Minoxidil & Finastride Lipid Solution For Topical Application 60ml
Description:
Morr F 5% Minoxidil & Finastride Lipid Solution For Topical Application 60ml:

Ideal For: Men & Women

  • Sulfate Free
  • Hair Type: All Hair Types
  • For Damaged Hair
  • Formulated For: Anti-hair Fall

What is Morr-F?
Morr-F containing the 2 active ingredients minoxidil and fin, as DHT Blocker and promote hair regrowth. It works by encouraging hair follicles that have stopped producing hair to begin making new hair and inhibit the natural hormone DHT from forming. It is mainly used by adult men to treat male pattern baldness.

How is Morr-F used? 
Morr-F should be massaged into the scalp with your fingers once per day. Also it will depend on the patients condition and their response to the therapy.

The Morr-f contains Minoxidil and Fina in a topical solution form so you are spared from the side effects of taking finas orally while having its benefits directly on hair roots..The solution is meant to be applied directly on scalp just like a hair oil which does not need prescription since minoxidil topical solutions are available OTC as per FDA.

Indications
This herbal multivitamin syrup is indicated in-
  • General debility
  • Mental weakness

  • Hypolactation

  • Lack of appetite

Therapeutic Class

Pharmacology

This herbal multivitamin syrup provides sufficient zinc which plays a significant role on the intellectual functioning of children. This syrup also contains a balanced proportion of extracts of various vitalizing herbs successfully used for centuries to provide energy and stimulation of muscles & nerves.

Precautions & Warnings

Storage Conditions

I-Can Pregnancy Test Strip is a convenient and easy-to-use home pregnancy test kit designed to detect the presence of the pregnancy hormone (hCG) in a woman’s urine. The test is highly accurate and provides quick results, typically within 5 minutes, making it a reliable option for confirming pregnancy in the privacy of your home.

 

Pregnancy tests look for a special hormone —human chorionic gonadotropin (HCG) — that only develops in a person’s body during pregnancy. These tests can use either your pee or blood to look for HCG. At-home pregnancy tests that use your pee are the most common type. When used correctly, home pregnancy tests are 99% accurate‡•§

 

  • Product Name: I-Can Pregnancy Test Strip
  • Type: Home Pregnancy Test Kit
  • Brand: I-Can
  • Early detection of pregnancy.
  • Can be used any time of the day.
  • Fast and easy to use.
  • Suitable for self-testing and professional use

 

Benefits:

  1. Quick and Convenient: Provides results in just 5 minutes, allowing you to confirm pregnancy quickly without the need for a doctor's visit.

  2. Highly Accurate: When used correctly, it offers over 99% accuracy, providing reliable results from the first day of a missed period.

  3. Easy to Use: The strip is designed for easy handling, with clear instructions, making it simple to use at home.

  4. Sensitive Detection: Detects even low levels of hCG hormone, making it effective from the early stages of pregnancy.

  5. Private and Discreet: Allows women to test for pregnancy discreetly in the comfort of their home, maintaining privacy.

 

How to Use:

  1. Collect the Urine Sample:

    • Use a clean, dry container to collect your first urine in the morning, as it contains the highest concentration of hCG.

  2. Dip the Strip:

    • Open the sealed pouch and remove the test strip. Hold the strip by the colored end and dip it into the urine sample for about 5-10 seconds. Make sure the urine does not go above the MAX line on the strip.

  3. Wait for Results:

    • Place the strip on a flat surface and wait for 3-5 minutes.

  4. Read the Results:

    • One Line (C): Negative – Not Pregnant.
    • Two Lines (C and T): Positive – Pregnant.
    • No Lines: Invalid – Repeat the test with a new strip.

  5. Dispose of the Strip:

    • After reading the results, dispose of the strip safely.

 

Precautions:

  • Use the test on or after the first day of a missed period for accurate results.
  • Do not touch the test window to avoid contamination.
  • Read the results within the time frame mentioned (5 minutes); results may change if read after a long time.
  • Always check the expiration date before use.

 

The I-Can Pregnancy Test Strip is a reliable, fast, and easy-to-use option for confirming pregnancy at home. It provides accurate results in minutes, allowing women to take the first step in knowing their pregnancy status privately and conveniently.

Composition
Each 5 ml syrup contains extracts of-
  • Bacopa monnieri 1.21 gm
  • Asparagus racemosus 0.30 gm
  • Ipomoea paniculata 0.30 gm
  • Terminalia chebula 0.30 gm
  • Vetiveria zizanioides 0.30 gm
  • Zingiber officinale 0.30 gm
  • Foeniculum vulgare 0.30 gm
Indications
This syrup is indicated in deficit/Cognitive deficit, Age Associated Memory Impairment (AAMI), Attention Deficit Disorder (ADD), Dementia, Convulsion and Epilepsy in children, Alzheimer’s disease, Autistic Spectrum Disorder (ASD) and Drug addiction.
Therapeutic Class
Herbal and Nutraceuticals
Description
Bacopa monnieri (L) belongs to the Scrophulariaceae family and commonly known as Brahmi has been used in Ayurvedic system of medicine for centuries. It is a small, creeping herb with numerous branches and grows in wet soil. Flowers and fruits of Brahmi appear in summer and the entire plant is used medicinallyCompounds responsible for the pharmacological effects of Bacopa include alkaloids, saponins and sterols. Other active constituents are betulic acid, stigmastarol, beta-sitosterol as well as numerous bacosides. The constituents responsible for cognitive effects are bacoside A & B.
Pharmacology
The triterpenoid saponins and other bacosides are responsible for Bacopa’s ability to enhance nerve impulse transmission. The bacosides aid in repair of damaged neurons by enhancing kinase activity, neuronal synthesis, restoration of synaptic activity and modulating the cholinergic and GABAergic neurotransmission, and ultimately improves nerve impulse transmission.Bacosides appear to have antioxidant activity in the hippocampus, frontal cortexand striatum. Bacopa extracts modulate the expression of certain enzymes involved in generation and scavenging of reactive oxygen species in the brain. It exerts a protective effect against DNA damage in astrocytes and human fibroblasts.Asparagus racemosus is a well-known nervine tonic. It plays the role of an antioxidant by attenuating free radical induced oxidative neural damage. Antioxidant compound racemofuran of AR shows an enhancement in glutathione peroxidase (GPx) activity and glutathione content, and reduction in membranal lipid peroxidation and protein carbonyl.
Dosage & Administration
2-5 years:1 teaspoonful (5 ml) 2-3 times daily after meal for three months.6-12 years: 1-2 teaspoonful (5-10 ml) 2-3 times daily after meal for three months.Above 12 years and Adult: 2-3 teaspoonfuls (10-15 ml) 3 times daily after meal for three months.
Interaction
Bacopa may potentiate the activity of thyroid stimulating drugs or decrease the effects of anti-thyroid medications. It is important to note that this effect is not typically expected at the normal therapeutic dose for humans. Bacopa may work to decrease the toxicity of several drugs like morphine, and other opiate drugs. It has also been shown to reduce the decline in cognitive function associated with phenytoin, an anti-seizure medication.
Side Effects
There are no side effects associated with the use of Bacopa in the above mentioned therapeutic doses. Bacopa has been used safely as an Ayurvedic medicine for hundreds of years.
Pregnancy & Lactation
Women who are pregnant or nursing are advised to consult with a physician prior to use Bacopa. Although medical literature has not reported any adverse effects related to fetal development during pregnancy or to infants who are breast-fed.
Storage Conditions
Keep in a cool, dry place & away from direct sunlight. Keep the medicine out of the reach of children.

Indications

D-chiro-inositol capsule is indicated for the treatment and prevention of-

  • Polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS)
  • Anovulation
  • Menstrual disorders such as amenorrhea
  • Hyperandrogenism complaints such as hirsutism,
  • Alopecia, acanthosis nigricans, acne
  • Ovarian hyperthecosis.

Therapeutic Class

Trophic Hormones & Related Synthetic Drugs

Pharmacology

D-chiro-inositol is extracted by a patented process from Carob (Ceratonia siliqua) pod that mostly found in Southern Europe. Deficiency of D-chiro-inositol in peripheral tissue causes insulin resistance that leads to hyperandrogenism in ovaries which results polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS). D-chiro-inositol helps to regulate the balance between androgen and estrogen by decreasing luteinizing hormone and serum testosterone level. It improves glucose tolerance and reduces circulating insulin. It reduces oxidative stress on follicle and decreases total cholesterol and triglyceride levels. D-chiro-inositol has been clinically proven as an effective treatment of ovarian cyst and PCOS associated metabolic disorders. It helps to improve and regulate normal ovulation after two weeks of administration. It also reduces hyperandrogenism related skin disorders like hirsutism, alopecia, acanthosis nigricans and acne. It lowers cardiovascular risk in women who are suffering from PCOS by controlling arterial pressure.

Dosage & Administration

Orally 1-2 capsules daily or as advised by the physician. Duration of the treatment should be minimum 2 months.

Interaction

Concurrent use with digoxin may result in increased digoxin toxicity.

Contraindications

Contraindicated in patient with known hypersensitivity to D-chiro-inositol.

Side Effects

Well tolerated in recommended dose.

Pregnancy & Lactation

Several human studies have been conducted with inositol has no clinically relevant adverse effects.

Storage Conditions

Store at temperature of below 30ÀöC, protect from light & moisture. Keep out of reach of children.

Antioxidant Properties: Rosemary is rich in antioxidants, such as rosmarinic acid and carnosic acid, which help protect cells from oxidative damage caused by free radicals. This can reduce the risk of chronic diseases.

Anti-Inflammatory Effects: Rosemary has anti-inflammatory properties that may help reduce inflammation in the body, potentially benefiting conditions associated with chronic inflammation.

Improves Memory and Cognitive Function: Some studies suggest that the aroma of rosemary may enhance memory and concentration. It's been traditionally used as a symbol of remembrance and is often associated with improved cognitive function.

Digestive Health: Rosemary may aid in digestion by helping to relax the muscles of the digestive tract and reduce gastrointestinal discomfort.

Immune System Support: The antioxidants in rosemary can support the immune system, helping the body fight off infections.

Respiratory Health: Rosemary's aroma can help alleviate respiratory conditions, such as congestion and coughs. It may act as a natural decongestant.

Stress Reduction: The aroma of rosemary has a calming effect and can help reduce stress and anxiety. It's often used in aromatherapy for relaxation.

Pain Relief: Topical applications of rosemary oil or creams can provide pain relief for sore muscles and joints.

Hair and Scalp Health: Rosemary oil is sometimes used in hair care products due to its potential to promote hair growth and improve the health of the scalp.

Antibacterial and Antifungal Properties: Rosemary has natural antibacterial and antifungal properties, which can help in preventing infections and maintaining good hygiene.

Skin Health: Rosemary oil is used in skincare products because it may have beneficial effects on the skin, such as reducing inflammation and improving skin tone.

Cancer Prevention: Some research suggests that rosemary may have compounds that inhibit the growth of cancer cells, potentially reducing the risk of certain types of cancer.

Heart Health: Rosemary may help improve heart health by reducing inflammation and blood pressure. It can also lower LDL (bad) cholesterol levels.

Anti-Aging: The antioxidants in rosemary can slow down the aging process by reducing the damage caused by free radicals.

Liver Health: Rosemary may support liver health by promoting detoxification and reducing oxidative stress on the liver.

Information about Manforce Staylong Gel

Manforce Staylong Gel is used to numb the normal, unbroken skin or on the outer genital area to prevent pain before surgical procedures such as inserting a needle, skin grafts or skin laser surgery. It belongs to the class of local anaesthetics known as 'numbing medication' used to produce local numbness (anaesthesia) on the skin before surgical procedures or injections.

Key Ingredients:
  • Lidocaine BP
  • Prilocaine BP
  • Preservative: Methylparaben IP

Key Benefits:
  • It works by blocking the transmission of the nerve signals in the body
  • This gel helps in decreasing the sensation of pain
  • It comprises Lidocaine and Prilocaine as the active ingredients
  • It might prevent the premature and rapid release of fluids in males
  • This gel may improve libido and might help in premature ejaculation

Directions For Use:
Use as directed on the label.

Safety Information:
  • Read the label carefully before use
  • Store in a cool and dry place away from direct sunlight
  • Keep out of reach of children

Product Name: Accu-Chek Instant Blood Glucose Strip 25's Pack
Description:
Accu-Chek Instant Blood Glucose Strip 25's Pack

Imported by: Radiant Pharmaceuticals Limited

 

The Accu-Chek Instant Blood Glucose Strip 25's Pack is a pack of 25 blood glucose test strips that are used with the Accu-Chek Instant blood glucose meter. These test strips are designed to measure the amount of glucose in a drop of blood, which can help people with diabetes manage their blood sugar levels.

Features

  • Fast and accurate results in just 5 seconds
  • Small sample size.
  • Easy to use with the Accu-Chek Instant blood glucose meter
  • No coding required

Benefits

  • Helps people with diabetes manage their blood sugar levels
  • Can be used to test blood sugar levels at home or on the go
  • Fast and accurate results help people make informed decisions about their diabetes management

How to Use

  • Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water.
  • Insert a test strip into the Accu-Chek Instant blood glucose meter.
  • Prick your finger with the lancing device.
  • Apply a drop of blood to the test strip.
  • The meter will automatically start the test and display the results in 5 seconds.

Important Safety Information

  • For in vitro diagnostic use only.
  • Do not use if the test strip is damaged or expired.
  • Keep out of reach of children.

Himalaya Lip Balm 5g

The Himalaya Lip Balm is a natural, herbal formulation designed to provide intense moisture, repair chapped lips, and protect them from environmental damage. Perfect for daily use, this lip balm keeps your lips soft, smooth, and nourished.

 


Key Features:

  • Natural Ingredients: Enriched with natural actives like Carrot Seed Oil and Wheat Germ Oil, providing deep nourishment.
  • Soothes and Heals: Prevents dryness and chapping, promoting healthy lips.
  • Protection from Sun Damage: Contains natural UV protection to shield lips from harmful rays.
  • Non-Greasy Formula: Lightweight and absorbs easily without feeling sticky.
  • Pocket-Friendly Size: Compact and easy to carry for on-the-go hydration.

 


Benefits:

  1. Provides long-lasting hydration.
  2. Repairs and rejuvenates dry and cracked lips.
  3. Forms a protective layer against harsh weather conditions.
  4. Keeps lips soft, smooth, and supple.

 


Key Ingredients:

  • Carrot Seed Oil: Rich in Vitamin A and antioxidants, helps heal and protect lips.
  • Wheat Germ Oil: Loaded with Vitamin E, it deeply moisturizes and enhances skin elasticity.
  • Coconut Oil: Adds extra hydration and prevents moisture loss.
  • Castor Oil: Known for its healing properties, it soothes and conditions the lips.

 


How to Use:

  1. Squeeze a small amount of the lip balm onto your fingertip.
  2. Gently apply it evenly over your lips.
  3. Reapply as needed, especially in dry or cold weather.

 


Ideal For:

  • All skin types.
  • Suitable for both men and women.
  • Perfect for daily use and during winter or harsh weather conditions.

Keep your lips hydrated and healthy with the Himalaya Lip Balm, a trusted choice for natural lip care.

Product details of Woodwards Gripe Water - 130ml (Indian)

 

Woodward's Gripe Water is an Ayurvedic remedy designed to gently relieve digestive discomforts like colic, gas, and acidity in infants. Formulated with key ingredients such as Dill Seed Oil and Sarjikakshara, this trusted gripe water neutralizes stomach acids and supports healthy digestion, particularly during teething. Free from alcohol and harsh chemicals, it is safe for regular use, helping your baby stay comfortable and cheerful. The convenient packaging makes it easy to carry when traveling with your baby.

 

Product Benefits

 

  • Useful during the teething period
  • promotes and aids digestion
  • Ensure healthy growth
  • Does not contain alcohol
  • contains oil of dil herd and sarjikakshar
  • convenient pack that you can carry whenever you travel

 

Woodward's Gripe Water is an Ayurvedic formulation with a combination of Dill oil and Sarjikakshara that provides symptomatic relief – from stomach pain caused due to gas, acidity and indigestion in infants and children. It is safe – strict checks are done at every stage of the manufacturing process to ensure the quality and hygiene of the product. Generations of mothers have trusted Woodward's to provide Colic remedies to their crying babies.

Buzuri is a time tested modern unani medicine, prepared with Chicory (Cichorium endivia) root & seed, Small Caltrops (Tribulus terrestris), Fennel (Foeniculum vulgare) root & seed and others valuable natural ingredients. Buzuri acts as prebiotic, antioxidant, febrifuge, diuretic and also acts as detoxifier and cleanser of liver and kidney. Buzuri relieves inflammation and normalizes body temperature. It is effective in oliguria, urinary tract infection, jaundice, hepatitis and amenorrhoea.
Contraindications
There is no known contraindication.
Precautions & Warnings
Keep out of reach of the children.
Storage Conditions
Store at cool and dry place, protect from light.

Description:
Indications
This is indicated in:
  • Support for cardiovascular health
  • Contribute to normal absorption and utilization of calcium and phosphorous in the body
  • Contribute to normal blood clotting
  • Contribute to the maintenance of normal bones
Therapeutic Class
Herbal and Nutraceuticals
Pharmacology
Phylloquinone is often called vitamin K1. Phylloquinone is fat soluble and stable in air and moisture. However, it degrades in sunlight. It is found naturally in a wide variety of green plants. Vitamin K is needed for the post translational modification of certain proteins, mostly required for blood coagulation.Vitamin K2 is necessary for the activation of osteocalcin, a protein that transports and integrates calcium into bone to ensure a healthy skeleton. Incorporating calcium into the bone matrix means that less calcium is available for harmful deposits in soft body tissues.Vitamin D3 (Cholecalciferol) is essential for normal bone growth & development and to maintain bone density. It also helps our body to utilize both Calcium & Phosphorus
Dosage & Administration
Adults and children over 12 years of age: 1-2 capsule daily or as directed by the physician.
Contraindications
Contraindicated in patients with known hypersensitivity to any of the ingredients.
Pregnancy & Lactation
Vitamin K & D3 is safe in pregnancy & lactation when used as recommended doses.
Storage Conditions
Store at a cool & dry place below 30°C temperature, Protect from direct sunlight & moisture. Do not freeze.

Product details of Hyperoxi Solution Hydrogen Peroxide 6%

  • Hydrogen peroxide is a gentle antiseptic that can be applied to minor wounds, scrapes, and burns to avoid infection. It may also be used as a mouth rinse to help clear mucus or alleviate mild mouth inflammation (such as canker/cold sores or gingivitis). When this chemical is added to the infected region, it releases oxygen. Foaming is caused by the release of oxygen, which helps to remove dead skin and clean the area. Deep cuts, animal bites, and severe burns should not be treated with this product.

¬†

Pharmacology:

Hydrogen peroxide is a strong oxidizer with antibacterialand antiviral properties. It has antiseptic, disinfectant, and deodorantproperties. Its antiseptic action is aided by its quick release ofoxygen when applied to tissues, but this effect is diminished when organicmatter is present. Effervescence's mechanical effect may be more useful forwound cleansing than its antimicrobial effect.

Administration& Dosage:

Follow the product's instructionsletter. Consultyour doctor or pharmacist if you have any questions about the information. Usecaution when applying to the eyes or large areas of skin.

If you're going to use this on your skin, make sure youclean the affected area first. 1 to 3 times daily, or as instructed by yourdoctor, apply a small amount of product to the affected area. Allow the area todry before applying a bandage after using this product.

If you're going to use this as a mouthwash, mix it with anequal amount of water first. Swish for at least 1 minute in the mouth over theaffected area, then spit out. This product should not be swallowed. Rinse up tofour times a day, or as your dentist or doctor recommends.

To get the most out of this tool, use it on a regular basis.Use it at the same time(s) every day to help you recall.

If your condition does not improve or worsens after 7 days,contact your doctor. If you suspect you have a serious medical condition, seekmedical help right away.

Description:
Indications
Cranberry is indicated in the treatment and prevention of urinary tract infection, Kidney stones
Therapeutic Class
Herbal and Nutraceuticals
Pharmacology
Cranberry (Vaccinium macrocarpon) is a native North American plant commonly used for reduction in urinary tract infections (UTIs) occurrence and kidney stone management. Cranberry reduces the need for repeated antibiotic use in the treatment of recurrent urinary tract infection. Bacterial adherence to mucosal surfaces is generally considered to be the initial event in the pathogenesis of most infectious diseases due to bacteria in human such as UTIs. Cranberry inhibits adherence of bacteria to the lining of the urinary bladder and urethra. At higher dose it also works as a urinary antiseptic and reduces incidence of stone formation. Recent publications show as much as 65% reduction in UTI with cranberry consumption leading to reduced use of antibiotics and reduction in the number of incidences of recurrent cystitis.
Dosage & Administration
1-3 capsules daily or as advised by the physician.
Contraindications
Potential contraindications of cranberry may be present with renal insufficiency and in persons with the potential for developing uric acid or calcium oxalate stones.
Pregnancy & Lactation
No known restrictions during pregnancy or lactation.
Storage Conditions
Store in a cool and dry place, away from light and moisture. Keep out of reach of children.

Indications

Panax Ginseng capsule is indicated to reduce fatigue and stress, increase vitality strengthens immunity, while recovering after long term fever and weakness, as a stimulant, enhance libido, increase physical endurance, prevents impotence, adjuvant therapy for diabetes. Posses antioxidant property.

¬†

Primary Uses-

  • Adaptogen and general tonic
  • Increased athletic performance and endurance
  • Immunomodulatory effects

Other Potential Uses-

  • Aphrodisiac; erectile dysfunction and fertility
  • Menopausal symptoms
  • Non-insulin dependent diabetes mellitus
  • Improved pulmonary function in treatment of severe, chronic respiratory disease; additive effect of antibiotic treatment for respiratory tract infection

Therapeutic Class

Herbal and Nutraceuticals

Description

Ginseng is valued as a medicine in China for over 2,000 years. The active ingredients in Ginseng are a set of compounds called ginsenosides. These complex chemicals have a variety of effects, ranging from stimulation of the nervous system to reduction of blood sugar levels. The herb also has an antioxidant effect, stimulates the immune system, thins the blood, and reduces LDL the "bad" cholesterol levels.

Pharmacology

Ginseng is an all-natural & clinically shown to increase body's oxygen uptake which is necessary to help make healthy energy. The pharmacological effects a) adaptogenic b) improvement of physical & mental performance. In human, some evidence suggests that ginseng can improve glycogen utilization, alcohol clearance, serum lipid level, and other metabolic parameters, which is taken as evidence of a pro-homeostasis, adaptogenic effect.

Dosage & Administration

One Panax Ginseng capsule one or two times a day or advised by the physician

Contraindications

Ginseng can be taken with any other vitamin, minerals or herbal supplement. No known contraindications according to the German E Commission and World Health Organization (WHO). However, as with any supplement, consult with physician if you are taking prescription drugs.

Side Effects

Over Ginseng's many years of use, no serious side effects or drug interactions have been reported.

Pregnancy & Lactation

No known restrictions according to the American Herbal Products Association and the German E Commission, but controlled, long-term safety studies are lacking. In Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM), ginseng root is included in prescriptions given during pregnancy, labor and postpartum.

Precautions & Warnings

Over stimulation and insomnia have also been reported with ginseng and anecdotal evidence suggests that excessive doses may mildly elevate blood pressure and/or cause hyper sexuality. Safety in young children or individuals with severe hepatic or renal disease is not known.

Storage Conditions

Keep below 30¬∞C temperature, away from light & moisture. Keep out of the reach of children.

Indications

Primary uses-

  • Cerebral insufficiency: memory deficit, depression, attention and memory loss that occur with Alzheimer's disease and multi-infarct dementia.
  • Vertigo and tinnitus (ringing in the ear) of vascular and involutional origin Peripheral vascular disease: improvement of pain-free walking distance in
  • Peripheral Arterial Occlusive Disease in Stage II according to Fontaine (intermittent claudication) in a regimen of physical therapeutic measures, in particular walking exercise.

Other potential use-

  • Protective action in hypoxia
  • Acute cochlear deafness
  • Sexual dysfunction associated with SSRI use

Therapeutic Class

Herbal and Nutraceuticals

Description

Ginkgo is generally accepted as a remedy for minor deficits in brain function, such as those that occur with advancing age. It is used to improve concentration and combat short-term memory loss due to clogged arteries in the brain, and to treat dizziness, ringing in the ears, headache, and emotional hypersensitivity accompanied by anxiety.

Pharmacology

Ginkgo biloba is one of the most widely used and studied herbal products around the world. The leaves are generally used to make medicine. Ginkgo biloba leaf extract mainly contains Ginkgo flavone glycosides and terpene lactones. Most Ginkgo supplements are standardized to 24% of the Ginkgo flavone glycosides and 6% of the terpene lactones. The Ginkgo leaf extract protects the neurons from oxidative damage potentially preventing the progression of tissue degeneration in patients with dementia. Additionally, Ginkgo biloba leaf extract improves blood flow throughout the body, and it restores the balance between prostacyclin and thromboxane A2 resulting in improved vasoregulation. Vascular contraction and improvement in the venous tone are thought to be the result of phosphodiesterase inhibition and release of catecholamines.

Dosage & Administration

For adults: 120-240 mg/day. 1 or 2 capsule 2 to 3 times daily or as advised by the physician.

Contraindications

Ginkgo should only be used with caution in patients taking anticoagulant or antiplatelet agents i.e. warfarin, heparin & aspirin. It is also contraindicated in bleeding disorders due to increased bleeding potential associated with chronic use (6-12 months) or before elective surgery. Contraindicated in patients with known risk factors for intracranial hemorrhage. There is no known restriction of the use of ginkgo in pregnancy and lactation.

Side Effects

No side effects following proper administration of designated therapeutic dosages. In pooled clinical trials involving 10,000 patients, the incidence of side effects produced by ginkgo extract was extremely small. There were few cases of headaches, dizziness, palpitation, gastrointestinal disturbances, bleeding disorders & skin hypersensitivity reactions. Rare cases of stomach or intestinal upsets, headaches, or allergic skin reactions have been documented. In higher than recommended doses, diarrhea, nausea, vomiting, restlessness, and weakness may occur.

Pregnancy & Lactation

Ginkgo biloba is not recommended for use during pregnancy. It is not known whether this product passes into breast milk. Because of the possible risk to the infant, breast-feeding while using this product is not recommended. This drug is also not recommended for use in children

Precautions & Warnings

Before taking this product, tell your doctor if you are allergic to it, have bleeding problems, seizures, convulsions or epilepsy. Ginkgo biloba may decrease the ability of blood to clot. Stop taking this product at least 2 weeks before surgery

Storage Conditions

Ginkgo Biloba Capsule should be stored at room temperature. Protect from moisture and light.
